name: Cappadocia Puzzle
description: Cappadocia Puzzle is a classic puzzle that offers you to put the picture together from a huge number of details! You will find as many as 15 puzzle levels with juicy graphics and an History-style plot that you will need to add up.

name: BomberHit
description: BomberHit is an action-packed multiplayer game where you defeat your opponents by detonating bombs. Think strategically, develop tactics, and conquer your adversaries in labyrinthine battles! Engage in combat with friends or online players and fight to become the ultimate bomber!

name: Fork Road
description: Fork Road is a first-person immersive atmospheric game with new gameplay , Be prepared to face fears you've never faced before

name: Farm Enough
description: Is it enough farm to advance? Farm Enough: Roguelike is a strategic farming roguelike where you craft, build, gather, and manage in order to earn money for the increasing rent.

name: Mysterious Voyage: Set sail
description: Here, you can freely sail your ship, explore the endless ocean, and find hidden islands and treasures!

name: Rana Neida
description: Figure out why Winter is angry and save Spring in Rana Neida. A Cute metroidvania platformer where you play as the aspect of Spring.

name: Vertig8
description: In Vertig8, explore a vertical world unlike any other. Ascend through a skyscraper, engaging in strategic gameplay and exhilarating action. Join internet celebrities in this unique multiplayer experience. Experience Vertigo and redefine your gaming adventure.

name: Fear Calibration
description: Who are you? What time is it? How long have you been in this place? In this horror-puzzle escape room, uncover the dark secrets hidden within the shadows as you solve your way through the empty classrooms of your school–or what seems to be of it. Do you really think you can escape this madness?

name: Unsought
description: Unsought is a 360° subjective exploration, panoramic horror adventure game. It takes place in a provincial town in 1990s Japan. You are an elementary school student lost in an empty town, but will you be able to return home?

name: Dark Throne
description: Awaken as a knight in this 2D Metroidvania platformer. Explore, unlock abilities, and battle foes to escape a treacherous dungeon.

name: Moving On
description: Follow Addison as they help their recently-deceased mother move on to the Spirit World. In this 2D visual narrative and platformer, Addison must explore and find special objects while being confronted with a journey of grief.

name: Towerheart
description: Towerheart is a simple sokoban-style puzzle game where you can swap with objects.

name: Chained Runes
description: Plan your chain of runes as well as possible, analyze your opponents, and build up an optimized deck to reach King Gormnoq.

name: Smile Simulation
description: Psychological-surreal-analog-survival horror game. Find the smiles and get out.

name: Tyga
description: Welcome to Tyga! It's your job to help us deliver lifesaving medicine to those who can afford it. With enough hard work, someday that could be you! See you on the road Tygan!

name: School Days Simulator
description: The high school is full of cute and adorable students! Make many friends on your first day at school, beat the bad student and eventually you will be falling in love with someone there. Which one do you want to be inside your heart?

name: Lunar Lander Redux
description: Explore a rough space landscape in a fragile capsule. Good for an hour of fun or frustration depending on skill. Physics mostly accurate.

name: Sea of Brave: Beast Island
description: Explore a unique island, find allies, and defeat the fearsome minions of Captain Kingg, in this new Sea of Brave adventure, a turn-based, single-player, deck-building, strategy roguelike. Don't let them capture you!

name: Fix This House
description: Immerse yourself in a relaxing and minimalist puzzle game where your task is to fix the building using a variety of blocks. Enjoy the interactive environment, soothing music, and sounds of nature. Solve puzzles, explore the world, and take your time!

name: Sumo
description: Fight up to 7 other players to try and be the last one in the ring in this arcade-inspired fighting game. Customize your character with hundreds of combinations of cosmetics. Tired of fighting? Fish with friends to unlock special fishing cosmetics!

name: Pyrrhic Paradise: Dissemble
description: Pyrrhic Paradise: Dissemble is a story focused action RPG that gives you the choice to build out the narrative, or destroy it.

name: Everlasting: Tomorrow
description: Embark on a harrowing journey with Alice, a college student, and her classmate Adrian, as they venture to a desolate town in search of a special cave. Uncover the chilling mystery surrounding Alice's strange nightmares and their connection to the town. The horror awaits.

name: Casino World
description: Casino World is a massively multiplayer casino RPG that provides the deepest, most satisfying casino experience around. Compete in season challenges, enjoy live parties, try amazing avatars, dance moves, and so much MORE!

name: Don't Kill Them All
description: Build your Orc clan and lead them on a journey of self-discovery and mindfulness in a unique blend of turn-based strategy and base-building. Venture into different regions and carefully navigate encounters while ensuring there’s something left on the battlefield for you to take home.

name: Croquettes Gang
description: Keep an eye on your master, steal his kibble and achieve your dream!

name: Horror School: The Classroom
description: Say hello to the eerie world of "Horror School: A Scary School Simulator Story," a first person anime horror game set in an abandoned classrooms at midnight. As the clock strikes twelve, the corridors come alive with malevolent squad and scary playtime lurking in the shadows.

name: Scary Horror Mansion
description:
Welcome to your new metaverse house, on the Scary Horror Mansion 3D!
You and your girlfriend poppy arrived on a scary mansion just outside the town. Because your grandma car is run out of gas, you decide to stay 5 night at this creepy house. But, something is very wrong in that room. At night, you can hear a yellow woman scream, a red clown laugh, a white baby with the dead wife or spooky ghost of an old granny nun running around in the mansion. To find out more about this strange paranormal activities, you'll place some camera footage recorder in each room.

name: Scary Wife Chapter 2
description: Hello, welcome into the Scary Wife Chapter 2, a love simulation horror game that will challenge your perception of reality. As you awaken in your neighbor house, there is a mysterious yandere girl who claims to be your new wife. However, you possess no recollection of this marriage, yet her enchanting beauty initially lulls you into a false sense of security breach.

name: WWII Simulator 3D
description: WWII Simulator 3D is a third-person shooter that takes place on WW2. You play as old private John Ryans from Sarge Company! The single-player campaign is the call of epic moments, story cutscenes and heroic duty. Become a toy soldier polygon with dog tag soldier that will go from D-Day in Normandy, through the Battle of Bulge in horror and finally to Berlin. Experience also the Pacific Front in the battle against Japan toys army and army men fight in hacksaw ridges, Okinawa.

name: Scary Doll: Twin Sister
description: Scary Doll: Twin Sister is the horror game spinoff for the scary dolls chapter series. Once again, you need to escape from the killer doll on 1950's black and white anime gothic lolita style. The simulator gameplay is very simple, you only need to find the key and escape. But the horror is intense and not just a walking simulator. This is the beginning of the horrors!

name: Hyper School Simulator
description: Play the latest anime virtual high school life on Japanese pixel city! Drive car or any vehicles, attack peoples, or become the gangster, you can do it all only on anime city. The city is based on real Japanese real city. While you have to fight to gain kawaii senpai love and date him/her. Build your own metaverse land on metaverse sandbox town!

name: Dangerous Land
description: Dangerous Land is a first-person strategic game enriched with elements of exploration and action. Assume the role of the ruler of your settlement, manage and develop it in real-time, recruit and upgrade units, take care of resources, and participate in epic battles.

name: BackRooms's 1995: The Lost Footage - Chapter1
description: My name is Jacob, and I'm 25 years old. I've heard a lot of rumors about an abandoned house where people claim to see strange things. But I'm not here for that. I'm here to find my brother. He disappeared in January of 1970, I'll do whatever it takes to locate him, no matter what.

name: Musgro Farm
description: Plant crops, combine them intro recipes, and distribute them for sale in this incremental factory game. Optimize your layouts and reinvest in your infrastructure to maximize your output. Gain experience to unlock new technologies and expand your ever-growing farm.

name: Abnormal State: Otome Love
description:
Summertime is here, and so is the love of your life!

In this otome game, you'll wake up in a certain game and find yourself surrounded by three guys who want you. But there's a catch: you'll die if you don't find true love!

name: Archipelago
description: Archipelago is a fast paced movement roguelike set on a cluster of floating islands. Slash, slice, and dash your way through the sky to challenge the final boss. will skill alone allow you to prevail?

name: Tinycraft
description: Demons from another world are coming, leading the allied forces of the Six Races to resist them. Choose your hero, build and continuously strengthen your team, and enjoy the collision of traditional RTS and Rogue mechanics in this world of sword and magic!

name: Little Duck Adventure
description: Together with your friend, help two cute ducks through many trials. Work as a team to get the big picture. And remember, communication is the key to success.

name: My Girlfriend is... Centaur
description: Step into an extraordinary romance despite physiological disparities. Can you navigate a relationship with a centaur girl and overcome the challenges together?

name: Mr. Pompy's Extravagant Quiz
description: You'll be putting your brains to the test as you navigate this terrifying trivia and puzzle experience with Mr. Pompy's Extravagant Quiz. While point and click may be your primary tools, your intellect and cunning are just as important.

name: Booster Racers
description: Are you ready to show your competitiveness? Here is Booster Racers, a chaotic racing game that you can play together with a friend in local multiplayer, or you can play alone too if you have no friends.

name: Crossword Go
description: Looking for some word puzzles to solve? Well, your search is over. Because Crossword GO is the newest, simplest puzzle game on Google Play!

name: Lucky Shot
description: It is often said that luck is the key to success.

name: Kuis Iseng Kaesang
description: Sin descripción

name: Bennys Backrooms
description: Work together with your friends (or betray them) to find multiple exits in the Backrooms. Expect to see the "You Died" screen a lot.

name: Speedy 500
description: Speedy 500 isn’t just a race; it’s a quest for immortality. Strap in, rev those engines, and chase the chequered flag. The countdown begins—500 miles await!

name: Pair Up
description:
Three is a crowd. Match two instead!

Tap on a sticker, find its pair, and it just feels so good.
Pair Up is a deeply satisfying match-two game that presents a treat for the eyes and tickles the brain. A perfect little puzzle game on the go or whenever you just need a little escape. Pair Up also has unlockable themes to suit any mood or craving you might have - cute animals, mouth-watering food, whatever floats your boat.

name: Digital Exorcist: CF1_Defrag
description: After the mysterious death of a Superstar Idol, disgraced DATA Agent Sawyer must face his ultimate challenge yet, being an undercover high school teacher while also keeping the Mississipi Inaka safe from Daemonic influence.

name: Hidden Cats: The Last of Cats - Extra Level
description: New challenge for your observation in this cozy and addictive object search game.

name: Trash Can Tactics
description: Ever since the Nature's Legacy Institute has opened their doors to all, there have been an odd string of thefts - not of rare artifacts, but rather of the food from the cafeteria. Play as either a museum staff member, or an intelligent raccoon, in this asymmetrical PvP heist game.

name: Memories: My Story, My Choice
description: Romantic Otome Game. Create your own lasting Memories and the choices are yours!

name: 666: El día del portal
description: Action-platformer game with dual scrolling and multidirectional shooting.

name: Abandoned Hut
description: Explore scary places in this first-person horror game. Interact with characters, solve puzzles and discover that bad intentions can lead to catastrophic consequences.

name: Aeronesia
description: Aeronesia is a non-linear platform RPG with emphasis on exploration, combat, dialogue and quest-based progression. After an accident transports you and hundreds of other people into an alien world, it's up to you to find a way to survive and discover some means of getting back home.

name: A Hunter's Tale
description: Explore Fuji's mysteries in this VR RPG adventure. Battle massive beasts, conquer challenges, and grow stronger with each encounter.

name: A Great Hunger
description: A short Visual Novel where a demon offers a woman a terrifying proposal: to kill the man she once loved.

name: Age of the Deep
description: Age of the Deep is a mermaid fashion looter rpg. Explore the beautiful, and terrifying, mysteries of the ocean surrounding the islands, fight off pirates that threaten the inhabitants, dive deep to uncover mysteries and equip the latest in swimwear to boost your stats.

name: Age of Privateer
description: Age of Privateer is a real-time card battle-based roguelike deck-building game. Combine various cards to create a powerful deck and explore the vast seas. Can you uncover the secrets hidden in the ocean and find the ancient treasure?

name: Agama Versus Bugs
description: Meet the ever-hungry bearded dragon. However, in pursuit of her next meal, she must watch out for various traps and obstacles lurking in the terrarium. Who will win in this adventure? an ever-hungry lizard or crunchy bugs?

name: You Are A Chat AI
description: "You are a chat AI" is a simulation game. No real AI is used, and the player pretends to be a chat AI and converses with NPCs. This game consists of two parts: "conversation" and "learning". The appeal of the game is that players who normally use AI can experience being used on the other hand.

name: Briko
description: BRIKO is a refreshing take on the classic brick breaking game. Wanna relax? Go break some bricks. Wanna see your friend cry? Make your own stage and watch them lose!

name: AirFlow: Sky Is The Limit
description: The sky is to becomes your battleground! Prepare to embark on adrenaline-fueled adventures in epic aerial combat like never before. In AirFlow, you'll pilot airplanes in intense sky and land battles, mastering the art of dodging enemy fire, to claim dominance over the skies and land.

name: AI Solitaire
description: AI Solitaire features Klondike Solitaire and Pyramid Solitaire, 18 different deck styles, and has password protected parental controls. The base game is offered for free and can be played as is without any cost forever.

name: AI Solitaire: Anime Cuties
description: AI Solitaire - Anime Cuties provides 12 new decks to use with AI Solitaire! This DLC is themed around beautiful girls in an anime style.

name: Super Action Hero
description:
Super Action Hero: Stick Fight is an epic action mobile game with simple controls.

Tap the Stickman to defeat enemies and learn skills to upgrade the Stickman!

Welcome to the supreme playground of stick figures! Become a totally amazing superhero duelist and save the world!

name: All Knowledge Authority
description: Be part of the All Knowledge Authority, and go in search of those forgotten mysteries in the corners of the world. Discover the secrets that forces that will surprise you want to hide. Go out in search of your destiny, that which unites the present, the past and the future.

name: All the Darkest Places
description: Step into Alex, an upcoming college freshman battling depression. Living with his widowed father, Alex prepares to move in with Laura, a friend of his late mother. Guide Alex through university life, navigating personal struggles, forming connections, friendship and support.

name: Dungeon Delivery
description:
Can you hear the urgent voices of warriors from the far away dungeons who are desperately in need of potions?
It's time for you to deliver potions to warriors in the dungeons, get close to the warriors, and make great money out of them!
Good luck!

name: Alpha Nomos
description: Hack, slash and feel the beat in this rhythm based action rougelite! Help Cello and her gang escape a musically driven, murderous puppet filled world that is as dangerous as it is groovy!

name: Almost Dungeon
description: Almost Dungeon reverses the roles by making you play a Dragon protecting his Dungeon. Arrange the corridors into a labyrinth of your liking and fool the adventurer who dared to enter your lair. Place traps in his way as fast as possible to get rid of him before he finds and slays you !

name: Alice's World
description: Alice's World is a story-driven 2D adventure puzzle game. Amidst desolate ruins and deserted cities in a world filled with death, the young girl Alice hears "your" voice from in front of the screen. You must guide her forward, solve the mysteries, and reach the top of the tower.

name: Algomancy
description: A competitive card game where you draft during gameplay to adapt to your opponent's strategy. Absolutely free to play with no grinding.

name: A Letter From Mom
description: On the morning of your 14th birthday, you receive a party invitation from your missing mom. The address leads you to a cult village. In this point-and-click puzzle adventure, you play as Nero, a black cat, as you unravel the mysteries behind your mom's disappearance.

name: Alchemic Beasts
description: Alchemic Beasts is a monster taming RPG adventure where you breed and transmute creatures using alchemy to forge powerful monsters. Join Zeig, a thrill seeking daredevil, as he harnesses his alchemic beasts to defeat the creature known as the legendary Demon King.

name: AI Solitaire: Painted Ladies
description: AI Solitaire - Painted Ladies provides 12 new decks to use with AI Solitaire! This DLC is themed around beautiful women rendered in the style of traditional fantasy art paintings.

name: AI Solitaire: Solitaire Favorites Pack
description: Add multiple versions of Freecell, Canfield, Eagle Wing, Golf, and Yukon!AI Solitaire - Solitaire Favorites Pack adds some of the most popular versions of solitaire for you to play in AI Solitaire!

name: Minecraft: Star Wars Sequel Skin Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Mortal Kombat X: Predator/Prey Pack
description: Three new character skins. Play as Commando Johnny, Infrared Scorpion, and Carl Weathers as Jax in this themed pack. Kombat Pack owners get early access and should not purchase separately.

name: Tiny Farm
description: For a farm so small it fits in your hands, Tiny Farm is jam-packed with sweet surprises and endless possibilities!

name: Angry Tiny Sun
description: Unleash your dominance in the arena with explosive power-ups, strategic plays, and electrifying combos in our adrenaline-pumping 'Hot-Potato-With-Physics' style combat! Angry Tiny Sun has absolutely zero Pay-To-Win Features!

name: Androsystem Idle
description: Produce Androids and create a Fleet that will help you conquer new planets. Mine valuable minerals that will further increase your production capacity.

name: Anders: The Dark Coast
description: In "Anders: The Dark Coast," dive into a sinister underworld after a fateful encounter. Unravel the mystery with Anders and friends as they confront a malevolent gang, leading to a deeply personal reckoning with the elusive leader, Jayden.

name: Animal Bomb Chess
description: This is a Chess games. You can choose your animal at the beginning of the game. animals with their own characteristics, manipulate them to obtain props on the map, and use them. Although the process may test one's luck, you must still make every effort to survive until the end.

name: Ant Attack
description: Ant Attack - A peculiar blend of Clicker and Tower Defense.

name: Annuit Coeptis
description: Deckbuilder. Roguelite. Metaprogression. Words are a weak attempt to describe reality - in Annuit Coeptis you use cards to wreak violence across a land poised upon the brink of destruction. Will you defy the End of the World?

name: Another Realm
description: You awaken at the shores of a land seemingly far from home, your boat wrecked, not really knowing what actually happened. Your only option is to find civilization and hope to find a way home. Not all is as it seems, as Jimmy will soon find out!

name: Anime Girl Puzzles: Honomi
description: In the elegant serenity of the imperial palace, Honomi practices the Geisha arts. She is ready to do anything her master desires.

name: Anime Girl Puzzles: Sana
description: It's harvest season on the Yamaguchi farm! Sana is busier than ever, making sure her crops are collected on time.

name: Anime Girl Puzzles: Suki
description: Quiet in the library! Suki is very protective of the books and documents in her archives, and she can be very strict with rule-breakers...

name: Animeahikoaprinceaverse A4: Prince Akihiko & Princess A
description: When the prince of the kingdom was cursed, rendering his magic uncontrollable, However, the curse weakened when the prince was near his two fiancées. One of his fiancées managed to discover the origin of the curse, and they embarked on an adventure to lift the curse from the prince.

name: Animal Race Run VR
description: This is an exciting leisure game, which brings players the opportunity to watch and participate in animal race. Using VR technology, players are on a runway arena, and they will enjoy the fierce competitions of animals.

name: Ama's Lullaby
description: Point-and-click (& type) adventure game set in a retro-futuristic world, featuring a command-line based hacking system.

name: Among The Dead
description: Among the Dead is a turn-based zombie RPG. The player fights against zombies and other enemies and walks around a map from a top-down perspective.

name: An Agonized Mind
description: An Agonized Mind is a minimalist, survival horror, 2D top down shooter. Explore corridors filled with mutilated human experiments as you run and shoot your way to freedom. Gather resources and upgrade yourself, choosing to be robotic or human as you fight horrors of the compound.

name: Anandala
description: Anandala is a virtual reality art experience where you explore a vast labyrinth of ever-changing, psychoactive abstract art and interact with curious and expressive artificial-life creatures.

name: Anchors: Start
description: Anchors:start is a Cthulhu style 2d shooting game.The game requires players to explore in various maps generated by the program,find and bring back equipment,and live in a base full of doomsday atmosphere.When you explore the map,you see some strange things,calm down.Maybe that's truth!

name: Ancient Savo
description: Raise a family in the pristine woodlands of ancient Finland. Manage your homestead, craft tools and items, barter for goods, live off the land. Continue as your offspring, start new homesteads. Plan wisely to survive in the wilderness where cold, hunger and accidents are your enemies.

name: Ancient Scroll
description: Ancient Scroll - the game is a mixture of an adventure game and classic quests. You have to go to an abandoned ranch in search of an ancient scroll. Where an exciting adventure awaits you, hiding many mysteries!

name: Ancient Totems
description: Ancient Totems - is a puzzle platformer game in which you have to take control of Totems and return energy to the abandoned temples and pyramids of a vanished civilization. Totems can assemble to combine abilities

name: Bloodgrounds
description: Delve into roguelike arena combat and city management where core gameplay features strategic battles, town development, and character growth. Command Gladiator units and navigate various mechanics for a comprehensive gaming experience.

name: Bloobs Adventure Idle
description: Dive into an immersive idle RPG adventure! Level up, gather resources, craft powerful gear & Tools. Explore vast lands, conquer foes, and master your skills. Enjoy the nostalgic pixel graphics in the world of Bloobs!

name: Bloxolotl
description: Bloxolotl is a cozy puzzle game all about cute block-shaped Axolotls and connecting them together.

name: Blue Hunter
description: Welcome to hell! Forge your own path as a Blue Hunter and turn into a god! Create your own army of undead monsters and beat all the monarchs that stand in your way. How far can you go?

name: Zopa
description: Meet the new game! In the role of Little Red Riding Hood's relative, you will go on a forest adventure. Throw explosive pies, meet wolves, pigs, gnomes and other inhabitants of the forest. Funny cutscenes, voiced dialogues, unique locations - every step is a new challenge!

name: Blunder The Sea
description: Use movement and your spear gun to take down underwater baddies. The goal? Treasure of course!

name: Blumgi Soccer
description: Blumgi Soccer offers a refreshing take on soccer. With big kicks and a dynamic physics system, every level invites you to strategize, kick, and score in ways you've never imagined. Get ready for a soccer experience like no other!

name: Bluff with Ash
description: A story of retracing memories. In your recollections, defeat the oncoming saboteurs and get the truth. Even if it is a tragedy.

name: Board Game Party
description: This is a 3D game integrating various classic board games. Players can engage in online battles, strategize against AI, or enjoy local mode with friends. It offers an immersive gaming experience with realistic graphics and a global leaderboard.

name: Containment Search
description: You are in an abandoned garage warehouse and have been locked up. will you survive the horror that awaits you there or will you stay trapped there forever?

name: Someone's Outside
description: You had a long day at work and just arrived home. However, something feels off.

name: The Walking Dead Match 3 Tales
description:
The Walkers are coming.
Defend against enemy survivor groups and Walkers in this never-ending fight for survival.

name: Com2uS Pro Baseball V24
description: Enjoy real baseball! The latest in the Compya series, Com2uS Pro Baseball V24! Experience the most realistic professional baseball game created with KBO official license!

name: The Torture House
description: In September 1994, Victoria Atkins, a young aspiring model, was traveling through Cooke County, Texas, in search of job opportunities when she suddenly disappeared. While it was initially believed she had simply become lost on the road, days passed without any sign of her. But what no one could imagine were the horrors of the ultra violence she would experience in a place that could easily be described as hell, The Torture House.

name: DragonSky
description: 3D high-quality shooting action RPG! Conquer the wider global sky with other players from all around the world.

name: NBA Now 24
description: NBA Stars Await You in NBA NOW 24! Join the League and Show 'em What You Got!

name: Idle Strikers 1945
description:
Strikers 1945 Fighters Ready to Scramble!
Fighters have gathered and are ready to launch with your command.
Write a new history with Fighters!

name: MLB 9 Innings 24
description:
MLB 9 Innings 24, the best baseball game in the palm of your hand!
Mike Trout's favorite baseball game!

name: Forlands
description: As a Martial Arts MMORPG are largely influenced by codified systems and traditions of well-known combat practices. You can find various gameplays, multiple social systems and dungeons as well as cross-server matches and guild wars in the game.

name: Idle Legends
description: Idle Legends is an arena card game containing Japanese-Western style anime characters. Each character in the game is made in detail. Flamboyant effects and ultimate weapon guaranteed to make you addicted! This game adopts an elemental system consisting of elements that mutually reinforce and hold each other. There are hundreds of gods with unique skills in this game. When upgraded, will get a new skill or attribute other elements. You can match each other elves and relics freely to create a strong army and embark on an adventure journey. Are you ready to start this new adventure? Don't miss this exciting game!

name: Scroll of Onmyoji
description: "Scroll of Onmyoji: Sakura & Sword" is a super popular Japanese MMOARPG game with a competitive style of play, an original fantasy story, along with a beautiful Japanese style. The sound of this game is filled by famous Japanese actresses and voice actors to give you a pleasant experience while playing. This game received a very good rating from Japanese players when it was released in Japan due to the exciting gameplay, stunning image styles, and a talented team of voice actors.

name: Astral Fable
description: Astral Fable, a 3D cute anime MMORPG that is themed around a self-created story of the war between the Heaven and Devildom. In the game,players can defeat monsters and unlock spectacular skills throughout the journey. The best part, you'll never be alone here! There will be pets fighting alongside you together with the support of your couple. You could also join a guild to save this world with your comrades! This is gonna be the one you don’t wanna miss!

name: Astral Guardians
description:
[Astral Guardians] is a magical MMORPG with a wide world view and cool content featuring various dungeons and classic PVP experiences. As an MMORPG game, this game has incredible scene images with cool effects that give players a complete gaming experience.

This title was released multiple times under different names:
- Astral Guardians [Indonesian]
- Gaia Odyssey
- Gema do Destino [BR]
- Gem-X
- Cazador de gemas [ES]
- Chrono Travelers
- Dreamland [Arabic]

name: Starlight Isle
description: This is an MMORPG that you can’t miss in 2020. What are you waiting for? Jump into this fantasy world with your friends now! Captivating Black Desert, dreadful dragons and enchanting elf await! Embark on this fun journey and begin your tale!

name: Mirage: Perfect Skyline
description:
Mirage: Perfect Skyline is a new MMORPG with gods and demons-based theme, offering a variety of well-designed team events. No longer do you have to face the world alone! Whether to become a demon or a god… The choice is in your hands…

This title was released multiple times under various different names:
- Mirage: Perfect Skyline
- Advent of God: Legends [Indonesian]
- Dark Continent: Mist [Indonesian]
- Stellar/Starfall Fantasy: Neverland
- Lost Sanctuary: Eternal Origin
- Jade Legends: Immortal Realm [Indonesian]

name: Idle Digging Tycoon
description: Welcome to Idle Digging, the ultimate mobile idle game where you become a master digger and embark on an exciting mining adventure! Unearth treasures, rare artifacts, and valuable resources as you dig deeper into the depths of the earth.

name: Elephants and Snakes and Crocodiles
description: A Super Mario World romhack created by Morsel.

name: Micro Tanks
description:
The Classic Artillery Tank Game!
Time To Get Shell-shocked!
Micro Tanks is that fan favorite artillery tank game from your childhood. Destroy the enemy in classic mode or free for all mode firing at will.

name: The British Trivia Challenge
description: How well do you know your British Trivia? Test your knowledge in The British Trivia Challenge!

name: Wrestling Trivia
description: How well do you know your Wrestling Trivia?

name: Kids & Family Movie Trivia
description:
It’s Trivia for the Entire Family!

Test your knowledge on Family-Friendly Movies.

name: Shadow Hush
description: In 'Shadows Hush' infiltrate 'Guard' to unveil sinister experiments. Stealth mastery is key. Unravel secrets with cunning, aided by your radio partner. Will you save the world?

name: Big Helmet Heroes
description: Throw yourself into an epic 3D beat'em up adventure with adorable knights, full of surprising worlds and situations. Grab your buddy and play in 2 player co-op to save the princess, but this is only the beginning!

name: 7 Quests of the Hero
description: A one player action adventure with comedy elements! - Seven maidens have been kidnapped and held prisoner by an evil sorcerer... Your mission is to locate and rescue them back to the safety of the castle and then keep them amused for the duration of their stay!

name: Snowfall
description: Help the beautiful babes escape from the obstacles overhead! This release includes holiday-themed HD graphics, intense, cooperative multiplayer, and a few surprises!

name: Epitaph: Soutai no Aitai
description: Windy and Dokuo go on a journey through various isekai as dimension-hopping heroes, facing a different Demon King each time.

name: Super Sexy Swiss
description:
What's the mission of the S.S.S.C.F.A.T.T. - Super Sexy Swiss Cardio Frenetic Ambulance Transplant Team?

To deliver a living heart along with some MASSIVE FUN!

name: Tune Her Out
description: Successfully avoid your nagging girlfriend and beat the level.

name: Platformer From Hell
description: Platformer from Hell combines gravity, switches, and platforming to create an experience unlike any other. Thrilling jumps, mind boggling gravity puzzles, and a pastrami sandwich in distress awaits Tie Guy in the abyss of PFH. Fulfill your primal greed by destroying Tie Guy repeatedly in his tragic quest for the root of all evil. Take control of Tie Guy on his journey to save his sandwich and traverse the depths in this passion inducing platformer.

name: BoomYa!
description:
Up to four friends can battle it out in this classic boom-tastic game!

Pick your monkey and start dropping bombs to blow up your rivals!

Wage war across four Arenas and collect different power-ups to boost your bombs and stats!

name: Shoot or Date
description: Be fast to the draw and either shoot or date the randomly chosen mate.

name: Avatar Dairansen
description: Avatar Dairansen is an arena style fighting game. Players choose the fighting style of their avatar with choices that include a kung-fu, ninja, samurai, and zombie style. Each style comes with a low and high projectile move and each character also has a dash and jump move, however performing a move will drain some energy that the move costs to do so the player can't constantly do the same move over and over until the move meter refills. The game also has destructible environments where the player can knock their opponent into a building. Players can also design their own arenas to do battle in.

name: Knoblins
description: Knoblins is a delightful little toy that lets you hatch musical creatures and perform songs for an ever-growing audience. Knoblins is designed to be very approachable and easy for anyone to pickup and play, whether you are musically inclined or not!

name: Claw Machine Arcade
description: Claw Machine Arcade is an Action game, developed and published by Squimball Studios, which was released in 2014.

name: Demolition Derby Reloaded
description: Take part in a demolition battle on city streets between old worn out cars using the latest in high tech 3D rendering, physics, collisions and interaction. You must last the longest, take the least damage, and score the most points within the time limit. Attack with your rear bumper and avoid chasers coming in with trying to T-Bone you from the side. This game features detailed urban environments, city roads, buildings, and many different types of cars.

name: Storage Warfare
description: Have you ever heard of a Storage Auction? Well Storage Auctions are modern day treasure hunts. In Storage Warfare, you attend storage auctions and your goal is to locate the treasures buried within the storage units, and then turn a profit! Keep a close eye on what is in each unit, so that you have the best chance to turn a profit. Outbid, Outsmart and Defeat your opponents in Storage Warfare!

name: Ore'n: Battle Meme Chronicle
description: ORE'N - Battle Meme Chronicle is a cards game developed by KONAMI.

name: Suction Co-Op
description: Have you ever wondered how life would be as a suction cup? Now is your chance! Bring a friend – and let the sucking fun begin!

name: Jump To Win!
description: Four-player one-button jumping mayhem with ever-changing camera angles and velocity. Bring friends! And beer!

name: Unstable Blocks
description: Warning! Highly addictive action puzzle game. Single or Multiplayer. Stack the blocks to the target height, but beware these blocks are unstable.

name: Ultimate Drunken Warrior Master
description: Ultimate Drunken Warrior Master is an Action game, developed and published by Psychdyke, which was released in 2013.

name: Zgirls
description: Z-Girls is a strategic mobile game app available for android and iOS. You assume the role of the commander of a school situated in a post-apocalyptic world overrun by undead. Collecting resources, training your students, and battling undead and other schools alike, you slowly grow in strength, ready to take on the doomsday horde.

name: Friendship Bracelets Simulator
description: A little game about making friendship bracelets

name: ToHeart
description: The late-’90s landmark visual novel from AQUAPLUS is back and fully remade with 3D scenes and animations, full HD resolution, the choice between the original cast or all-new voiceovers, and international translations for the first time ever!

name: Dragons of Atlantis
description: Raise and train an army of legendary dragons, build a powerful kingdom, and found your own civilization of Atlantis! Compete online with players around the world to awaken the buried memories of Atlantis!

name: Skate Tribe
description: A vertical scrolling skateboarding game from 1990, featuring nine levels. Originally an Atari ST game, it was later ported to the Amiga in AMOS.

name: A Way Up
description: Immerse yourself in the thrilling world of "A Way Up," a fast-paced 2D pixel art platformer created during an intense 72-hour game jam. In this adrenaline-pumping adventure, you start on a precarious platform, only to plummet into the depths of a mysterious cave. Your objective? Ascend to the exit as quickly as possible!

name: Watermelon Merge: Strategy Game
description: Watermelon Merge: Strategy Game is a cute and fun watermelon merging game where players combine two of the same fruits to create a larger fruit, until finally merging into a complete large watermelon. Not only does it offer classic gameplay, but also innovative modes for everyone to choose from. In the game, players earn points by merging fruits. The more consecutive merges, the higher the score. The game ends when the number of fruits on the field exceeds the limit. Additionally, there is a scoring system that ranks players globally, challenging them to achieve higher scores and stimulating their competitive desires, adding to the game's fun and challenge.

name: RobinWords
description: RobinWords is an word puzzle game that challenges players to form words from a given set of letters. Players can enjoy a single-player mode against an AI or compete with friends in multiplayer mode.

name: Elfland Reloaded: Volume 2
description: In Elfland Reloaded, you take on the role of Elfie or Elfita to try and save the elf village from threatening trolls. On your quest, you will encounter helpful turtles, aggressive birds, bouncing springs, purple elf-eaters, and other assorted creatures. In the second volume, you will meet the cloud people, Mortimer (Gorgimer's cousin), a gigantic bird, and the evil trolls. You will also get the chance to defeat the Troll Chieftain, rescue the village elves, and receive the Elf Medal of Honor!

name: Fortnite: May 2024 Fortnite Crew Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Skull and Bones: Season 1 - Raging Tides
description: With resource-rich merchant convoys sailing the Indian Ocean, pirates from across the world are driven into a feeding frenzy. Join the fray and face new, powerful enemies including the vicious Plague Lord Phillipe La Peste, Elite Warships, and more. Fight for your share of loot amidst the first season of Skull and Bones, Raging Tides.

name: Skull and Bones: Season 2 - Chorus of Havoc
description:
Clash against emerging threats - from the eccentric Hubac Twins, to a colossal megalodon stalking the seas.

Earn new exclusive rewards through time-limited festive events, including the Dragon's Regatta and Summer Fiesta.

Discover more ways to expand your pirate empire, from new features like Ship Upgrades and Fleet Management, to new opportunities like Manufactory Defense and Buyout.

name: Geg 2: Nazad v Budushchee
description: Sin descripción

name: Ruby Rose: Ace Attorney
description: Ruby Rose Ace Attorney is a crossover between the Ace Attorney video games and the RWBY web series.

name: I Am Cat
description: "I Am Cat" is a VR sandbox adventure game where players step into the role of a cat living in Granny's house. Explore the house, interact with its environments, and complete cat-themed quests. The game offers free-form exploration, physics-based interactions, and mini-games, allowing players to solve puzzles, play games, and create mischief. Whether sneaking around, uncovering secrets, or causing chaos, the choice is yours.

name: Turnabout Bakeshop
description: ​It's not easy going legitimate. When Winfred Kitaki is fatally shot behind the counter of the Kitaki Bakery, Wocky is charged with premeditated murder. But don't worry! Apollo Justice has come back to the office, and he has a plan, a witness, and an airtight argument. The only problem is, he also has the worst defendant ever.

name: Liar Liar 2
description: A remake of the original Liar Liar 2 with new sprites, backgrounds, story and CGs from guest artists.

name: Strangers In The Land Of Turnabouts
description: Mr. Albert sets out to prove a landlord didn't steal a car from one of his tenants.

name: Scary Stranger 3D
description: Prepare yourself for prank games with Scary Stranger 3D and Nick & Tani. If you're a fan of Scary Teacher and Scary Neighbor games, get ready to face the ultimate challenge with the Scary neighbor in this hair-raising 3D offline scary game experience. Embark on a thrilling journey through a twisted narrative filled with puzzle, pranks, and dark secrets. Play as Nick & Tani and make sure to stop the plans of your scary neighbor with your prank games.

name: A Turnabout With Too Many Faces
description:
Four perfect strangers awaken in an empty hotel.
Trapped in a snowstorm, forgotten by the living and pitied by the dead, they are guided by the strange voice on the vinyl.

It appears they've found themselves in a game.
The rules are simple.
Frankly, they couldn't be simpler.

In four days, they shall be released.
There is only one instruction they must follow:

"Do not kill anyone."

name: A Burned Man Walks Down The Desolate Corridor
description: Taking place in an Alternate Universe, the plot begins in 2036 where Apollo Justice and Kristoph Gavin are investigating a mysterious letter warning them about the impending death of Amelia Wonderley that appeared at their office. Things take a turn for the worse when they track down the sender to the office of Private Detective Joseph Sternwood, whose corpse is found in his locked office.

name: The Empty Turnabout
description: Taking place in an Alternate Universe of Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney – Dual Destinies, The Empty Turnabout features the murder of Ian Arts, a mysterious wealthy man responsible for a major scandal in the past. Apollo Justice steps up and decides to defend Nathaniel Marston of this crime, believing that he is innocent despite having confessed to the deed.

name: Turnabout Revivals
description: A car. A body. A pistol. And the smell of the ocean...

name: Turnabouts of the Father
description: Set in a alternative universe, chief prosecutor Ares Justice, father to Apollo Justice, has been on the hunt for the serial killer, "The Leviathan," who makes all his murders appear as suicides.

name: Turnabout Tomorrow
description: All mEn fall...

name: AI.VI
description: A mercenary robot is forced out of retirement as the P.A.S.C.A.L. Gigacorporation conquers his planet to squeeze it dry. Combine your FPS and tower defense skills, then send the corporate invaders to the scrapheap, seize the means of production, and take the planet back for the worker bots!

name: Crazy Teacher of Math in School Education Learning
description:
Welcome to Baldi Basic Education & Learning in School is a quick indie horror game, fully 3D interactive, fun-time educational game that teaches a slew of subjects in baldi's of Basics for Education the difficulties and Learning are great and lovely and the most
This is now the best Features!

You need to collect all 8 of the notebooks and escape the school, all while avoiding
In Basic Education & Learning in School game you need to collect all the laptops, solve the problems correctly and run away from school.
Can you do it?

name: Scary Math Teacher Boss Pranks
description:
You might have been playing many other teacher games, so say hello to the Scary Baldi Math Baldi teacher in the creepy teacher fun game.
The intention of the game is to gather five notebooks, and then escape the school, but that’s easier said than done! Get ready to take revenge to that goosebumps spooky neighbor by doing some pranks in their scary Baldi teacher house of Scary Baldi Math Baldi teacher: School Education Learning? Baldi Math's Teacher is a creepy game of revenge against scary school Baldi teacher by doing some creepy activities and don’t give them a chance to caught you otherwise angry Baldi teacher punish you a lot in scary Baldi teacher

name: The Assistant's Turnabout
description:
Play as rookie attorney June Rye, tasked with defending the impossible.

Phoenix Wright has just lost his badge due to a forgery charge. During his time in prison, scedules a meeting with Redd White, to which Redd White is found dead in a locked room. Phoenix is the only possible suspect, yet he claims Maya Fey killed him.

name: Drone Shadow Strike
description: Drone Shadow Strike - Aerial Combat is the best military warfare FPS game that offers an addictive mixture of strategy, fast-paced combat and real action! Operate the world’s best UCAVs with an arsenal of weapons and bring the rain!

name: Drone Attack Spy Drone Games
description:
Did you like Technology games then this new drone strike attack spy game is completely for you.This game is particularly created to increase your drone flying ability! You have to do different missions in the drone battle game, fly remote controlled drones and Complete your tasks as soon as possible.

Control ultimate military Drones and take them to the battle. Build your arsenal of devastating weapons and slay enemy firebase.while driving as a duty of fps Drone Driver be careful about Drone Battle and become the Drone Farming Master 3D. Try not to damage your 4x4 Drone on Endless Tough tracks.

3D Drone Flight Simulator game is not the most ordinary flight simulator around normally you get to fly with different planes in these kinds of games.. Fly your drone around a big city. Make use of the simple but very effective controls. This spy drone driving will also give a new tide to all flying simulators or airplane simulator. Enemies took a control on your army air base camp in these types of drone games.

description:
In this interactive story choice game, you are the one in control of the romantic story!
You have multiple options on how the story will unfold.
Immerse yourself in an enchanted game of your choice.

description: Immerse yourself in a mysterious story where your choices influence the hero's story and decide the ultimate fate of the characters. A story where love and carnal passion intertwine. Love, sex, and mystery.

name: Banana Ranch
description: Banana Ranch is a Boys Love (BL) / Gay dating sim game, mixed with farming and ranch management gameplay aspect. The story follows Ban (changeable name) who suddenly comes to a world with no human.

name: Ava and the Half-World
description: Face a horizon of forgotten myths, sunken relics and mysterious creatures! Fly, shoot and explore your way up the Sidereal Riptide, a dark expanse of water and the cradle of infinite drifting islands.

name: Cascade Theater

name: Paris Belle Epoque
description: A 2.5D adventure game mixing stealth, puzzles and actions in Paris at Belle Epoque. Anna, a young chemist, develops accidentally a murderous formula. Teamed up with her former laboratory rat Spunky, she will have to learn clandestinity, escape from Police to reveal the danger of her discovery!

description: THE FIRST CLASSIC CRPG IN THE WARHAMMER 40,000 UNIVERSE

name: StorySpark
description:
Choose your adventure with StorySpark, the ultimate interactive story game that empowers you to shape your own path in every captivating narrative! Immerse yourself in a world where your choices matter, and every decision leads to a unique and thrilling story.

Dive into pages upon pages of fun interactive stories that cater to your every mood, spanning from heartwarming tales of love to nail-biting suspense exploration of magical school (not unlike Hogwarts).

name: Warhammer 40,000: Chaos Gate - Daemonhunters: Castellan - Garran Crowe
description: A flawless soul entrusted with one of the Grey Knights' most heinous possessions: the Black Blade of Antwyr. Add Garran Crowe to your Strike Force and bring righteous fury against all foes, be they Cultist or Daemonkind.

name: Killer Klowns From Outer Space: The Game - Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
Digital Deluxe Content Includes:
2 Human Characters (Mike & Debbie)
2 Klown Skins (Fryzo & Sundaze)
1 Movie Klown Skin (Bibbo)
Digital Soundtrack
Digital Art Book

name: My Love 2
description: You choose the plot here. No crystals and tickets! Choices are equally important as they don’t cost crystals.

name: Capes: King City Edition
description:
In addition to Capes, the King City Edition contains:
- The complete Supporter Pack DLC
- 8 Alternate Hero Skins: Change your outfits to battle crime with new style.
- Digital Artbook: A look behind the scenes of the game, featuring concept art and inspirations.
- 24 Wallpapers in 4K: Enjoy characters and environments in beautiful illustrated images.

name: Ghost Town
description:
This story game brings a unique and fun twist to choose your own story adventures. you'll love making choices in this interactive story game!
One choice can change everything!
Immerse yourself in a mysterious story where you make the choices and decide the ultimate fate of other people!

name: Five Nights at Freddy's: Into Madness
description: A free compilation of several previous gameplay ideas in the same vein as FNaF World: Update 2.

name: Gyakuten Saiban: VR20-gou Jiken
description: Gyakuten Saiban: VR20-gou Jiken is a virtual reality entertainment attraction. The player plays as a technician subordinate to Ema Skye who investigates the crime scene and gathers evidence to help Phoenix Wright win the trial.

name: Cinderella After 4
description: Yukiko, the main character, whose only hobby is to drink tea elegantly at an old-fashioned cafe every Saturday. One day, she makes friends with a cute girl at the cafe. But something is wrong with her... she always disappears somewhere around 4pm...

name: May I Open My Eyes to the Night!?
description: This app will bring a unique and fun twist to choose your own adventure stories. You’ll love making choices in this interactive story game!

In this interactive romance otome game, you are the one in control of the romantic story!

description: Sin descripción
