Part 2 of the popular love story has finally arrived!

In this interactive romance otome game, you are the one in control of the romantic story!

You have several options as to how the story will unfold.
Immerse yourself in an enchanted game of your choice.

name: Secrets After Class
description: My high school Japanese teacher has a secret, he's a popular novelist in a literature department. Mr. Kangyong will deepen his relationship with a certain person in exchange for keeping his secret of being a novelist, even though the shadow of a relationship stares at the two of them.

name: Shimokita Rose & Tears
description: The protagonist is struggling with their gender. And realizing that they're in love with their best friend Haruto, the protagonist decides to work at Rose & Tears to be honest themselves about who they are, finding a family there who help them discover their identity.

name: Survive the Geeks Class!
description:
In this interactive story choice game, the one in control of the romantic story is you!
You have multiple option as to how the story will go.
Become immersed in an enchanted game of your choice.

name: Under a Tree with Cherry Blossoms: Love with One's Back
description:
Your story game, your love story, your own romance.
YOU decide what happens in each story.
Choose your story and let yourself be captivated by our immersive interactive series.

name: MLM Lover
description: The protagonist, who was lured into an MLM (Multi-level Marketing) company, comes across her high school crush! In order to make it big in life, she says goodbye to her dull old self!

name: Dirty Crown Scandal
description:
Four men who demand a relationship under the pretext of survival.

“Have you never thought that if I can’t have it, I might as well ruin you?”

A chill ran down Matias’ spine at the sound of a voice that was kind and smooth, yet ominous.
The laughter had remained in the man’s face faded, replaced by a stark emotionless expression as he added dryly.

name: Secret Kiss with Knight
description:
“Would you dare to betray with me?”

Unexpectedly meeting death during a mission, “I” am confronted by a mysterious “voice”
And so, the “voice” offers “me” a shocking deal.

Can this daring mission and deal be successfully completed?
To survive, I must win both his heart and his body!

name: Murky Divers
description: Co-op diving horror. Eliminate all traces of your employer's failed experiments from their abandoned underwater labs. Navigate your submarine, dive down with your crew, remove all corpses, but watch out for the abyssal terrors lurking.

name: Ridgeside Village: NPC Adventures
description: Ridgeside Village's official content pack for NPC Adventures!

name: Unromantic Demon Queen
description:
"I will regain my magic and become the Demon Queen!"

You, the heir to the Demon king, entered the human world and lost all your magical abilities.
You discover that you can restore your magical powers through intimate contact with three men you encounter by chance...

At the end of this adventure, will you be able to ascend to the throne as the Demon Queen?

name: Truth of Blood
description:
Passing a graduation exam with your life?
Graduation, death... or love?
A dizzying romance with 4 charming men of 4 colors, a time of blood and death (Truth of Blood).

name: Hiragana Hero
description:
Learn to read, recognize, and use hiragana as you guide Keen Reflex through a 50-floor labyrinth in an addictive and educational dungeon crawler RPG.
Learning to read [i]hiragana is the first step in your Japanese learning journey and it's the first hurdle that learners struggle to get over.
This addictive RPG dungeon crawler will have you reading Japanese in record time and cut out all that boring study.

name: Lavender Memories
description: A three minute experience

name: Running Memories
description: Running throgh a series of overlaying memories

name: The Nameless City
description: The Nameless City is a narrative-driven first person adventure inspired by Lovecraft's short novel of the same name. It has lo-fi 3D graphics inspired by the PSX era and uses AI generated images to convey concepts alien to the human mind.

name: A House for Alesa 3
description: One year after the events of A House for Alesa 2, Alesa and Greta decide to move away from the city and buy a house in a nice small rural town. However, unbeknownst to them, something wicked is taking place in the town. Now, the worst nightmare imaginable is about to begin...

name: Gay Joker
description: Gay Joker is a mod for Persona 5 Royal that allows Joker to romance the guys!

name: The Booty Creek Cheek Freak
description: The Booty Creek Cheek Freak is a 2022 short parody slasher horror game developed by Jordan King, and produced/published by Puppet Combo.

name: Kiss the Dragon
description:
“I...don’t want to lose you…”
The provocative, sensual, obsessive, and sweet tastes ―
Which dragon do I want out of the four?
"You" can make all the choices, only in 'Kiss the Dragon'!

name: Delivery Drop
description: Solve the puzzle and delivery the toy

name: Love, Death & Mummies: Zombie Romance Visual Novel
description: Enter a devastated world where zombies, mummies and humans fight to survive! Can the undead fall in love? Find out in this exciting story full of passion, betrayal and wars.

name: Traffic Race 3D 2
description: Traffic Race 3D 2 is a tribute to retro racing, race solo or split screen with a friend. Prove that you are an awesome driver by reaching the 1st place on the online leaderboards

name: Jian Xiao Travel
description: it seems that there is an unusual force, pushing him to embark on the long road to cultivate the fairy, he is the son of destiny? Or a lost dog? Or one of the ephemera? What kind of people will he meet? Do what? Figure out that What kind of path? When it's all over, can he start his own life?

name: Oh no! I'm about to fall in love!
description: The user takes on the role of the male protagonist Lu Shichuan and embarks on a journey of time and space with a photo. They meet seven beautiful women with completely different personalities and appearances. The final chapter of who you can stay with in the world is up to you to decide.

name: Airplane
description: An indie game where the goal is to defeat as many waves of enemies as possible, or have fun and weaving through buildings.

name: Absorb Invader
description: Play as alien microorganism and untilize local life to earn DNA and evolve. Absorb smaller cells, feed your cell to grow bigger and purchase upgrades for earned DNA between jumps. Go deeper to find bigger cells and more DNA and food to earn.

name: Amazing Curves Racing
description: Amazing Curves Racing: the simple, fast, and efficient racing simulator, where you start or join a race in seconds. The online multiplayer physics engine hides lag well and the tire model works directly on cubic 3D surfaces, for a high-speed racing experience not available anywhere else.

name: Amazônia Viva: Animais em Extinção
description: Embark on this adventure through the Amazon Rainforest, where you will take on the role of the legendary Curupira, the guardian of the forest. With the goal of saving endangered animals, you will face incredible challenges and learn about the rich biodiversity of the world's largest tropical forest.

name: Ameena: Witchborn Duelist
description: Embark on a dark fantasy quest, navigating procedurally generated realms. Master strategic card duels to avenge your mother against the underworld's greatest demon. Experience a blend of magic, strategy, and deep revenge in this ever-evolving adventure.

name: Amerta: The Abandoned Hotel
description: Amerta is a First Person Horror Game. Feel the experience of being trapped into another world. You will act as Maya and try to get out of the unseen world.

name: Ants.io
description: Join Ants.io, where you build an unbeatable ant army, collect power-ups, and battle to become the arena champion! Dive into dynamic action and grow your empire.

name: Apocalyptic Shadows
description: This game is set in a fictional post-apocalyptic Western Europe. They must use their wits and skills to survive in dangerous environments. On the road of adventure, players will encounter thrilling moments and feel an unparalleled tension and sense of accomplishment.

name: Aquarium Land: Armadillo
description: Adopt a little armadillo and explore the aquatic world together!

name: Aquarium Land: Baby Seal
description: Adopt a baby seal and explore the aquatic world together!

name: Aquarium Land: Parrot
description: Adopt a lovely parrot and explore the aquatic world together!

name: Aquarium Land: Puppy
description: Adopt a cute puppy and explore the aquatic world together!

name: Antisuns
description: Antisuns is a turn-based tactics sci-fi roguelike. Board enemy ships (each with an unpredictable interior), supported by your ship's weapons. Guaranteed combat results allow you to counter the enemies' telegraphed actions. Made a mistake? Just rewind, or start a new run with a reshuffled universe!

name: Aquelarre
description: Aquelarre is an historical, immersive, episodic Visual Novel. A narrative-driven game with Charcter development, RPG and Point And Click elements. Travel to a Medieval Spain in which beliefs and superstitions are true. Your decisions will make the legends come to life, influencing the story.

name: Arbo: Arena Tactics
description: ARBO: Arena Tactics is a sci-fi-themed PvP turn-based tactical strategy/CCG hybrid that pits players in a fast-paced battle of wits and theorycrafting as they command Squads of futuristic Heroes to engage in combat in an interactive hextiled arena.

name: Arcade Space Survivor
description: Arcade Space Survivor is a minimal Arcade-Styled Action-Roguelike. Fight against waves of different enemies. Collect Exp to upgrade your spaceship. Arcade Space Survivor offers an innovative and unique gameplay experience in the existing action-roguelike genre.

name: Arcane Treasures: Trading Card Game
description: Build a whimsical deck of cartoon animals to battle foes & uncover special treasures in this cute but competitive online Trading Card Game! Collect trading cards, open booster packs, and complete challenges to expand your collection!

name: Archery Simulator 2
description: Archery Simulator 2 is a thrilling game that is perfect for those who love to test their archery skills.

name: Architect Simulator
description: Manage your own architecture firm! Would you prefer to design one skyscraper or many residences, or maybe all at once? Create buildings, beautify the city, sell land plots, manage a warehouse, hire employees, buy real estate, and watch your health.

name: Arcanterra
description: Step into the mystical realm of Arcanterra and immerse yourself in a world of adventure! Forge bonds with loyal companions as you traverse through mystical lands. Equip yourself with legendary gear crafted through your journey. Engage in combat, unlock new skills and abilities as you grow stronger.

name: Bob Fight
description: BobFight is a hilarious party game for 2 to 4 players where you play as quirky characters in a series of chaotic mini-games. Take on your friends in uproarious challenges, earn crowns, and become the undisputed king of the party! Who will be the last Bob standing? Find out in BobFight!

name: Bofyne Unit: The Omega Contract
description: Meet The Bofyne Unit, a special team of western themed cosplayers who boasts of an extremely high success rate for various services such as Body Guarding, Item retrieval, and “Message Sending” Nothing stands in the way of a successful mission, not even laws!

name: Bomber Royale
description: A retro arcade experience.

name: Bonds of Yachiyo
description: At sunset, darkness swallowed everything. Bonds of Yachiyo is a Japanese horror tale of two best friends getting separated in a strange version of their own world. Escape from evil spirits, explore and solve puzzles as you try to unravel the truth and reunite the two friends!

name: BoneTown: The Second Coming Edition - Kinks Straight
description: Experience all new types of Straight sex. Threesomes, gangbangs, creampies, and pregnant are only the beginning, with a large chunk of new straight sex positions, character customizers, and more.

name: BoneTown: The Second Coming Edition - Kinks Lesbian
description: Experience all new types of sex. Lesbian sex, Threesomes and Futa girls are only the beginning. And play the entire game in the new Lesbian Mode where you can play the entire game having sex as your Lesbian Avatar.

name: BoneTown: The Second Coming Edition - Kinks Gay
description: Experience all new types of sex. Gay sex, Threesomes and Bi-sexual gangbangs are only the beginning. And play the entire game in the new Gay Mode where you can have sex with guys.

name: BoneTown: The Second Coming Edition - Kinks BDSM
description: Experience all new types of BDSM sex. Bound, and pegging are only the beginning. Play the entire game using BDSM sex on anyone you want.

name: Boss Rush Delivery
description: Battling beasts and bureaucracy, a newbie mailwoman must deliver a letter of utmost importance to a noble in a neighbouring nation. Shoot, slash, and dash to victory over 8 epic bosses in this fast-paced comedy boss rush action adventure! Delivery or Death!

name: Boop a Cat
description: Boop a Cat is made for stress free gaming, a way to just relax and care for a virtual feline.

name: Book of Spells
description: Book of Spells is an adventure game with RPG elements. You will take on the role of a traveler eager for new adventures!

name: Bony Bones Adventures
description: Bony Bones Adventures - is a 3D platformer where the lands of Zagrobiya have been enslaved by a necromancer. Help those in need, drive away the invaders, become a hero of Zagrobiya and return its freedom.

name: Books Upon Books
description: It’s time to turn the page and create the bookshop of your dreams. Customise your Layout. Customise your Colour Scheme. Build bigger and bigger. A casual, simulation game where you get to build and tend to your own bookshop.

name: Bonoru Adventures
description: Although it is a protected species worldwide, it is a harmful species in its own korea. The story of Bonoru, the water deer. I tried it as a casual former death, a platform game. space jump Arrow keys (wasd) movement Right mouse button special ability

name: Block Paradise
description: "Block Paradise" is an anime-styled Match 3 Game .

name: Bloom Echo
description: The name of the game is simple: Find a way out of the maze in record time.

name: Blenderman
description: Blender would love to have you for dinner. Dinner is served at 6 o' clock. You have until then to escape.

name: Blastgrid
description: Join Sparkle, the adorable protagonist from Technopurge, in BlastGrid! Navigate futuristic mazes, detonate explosive traps, and outsmart VoltMech adversaries in this charming turn-based puzzle game. Uncover the secrets behind the uprising and restore order to the cybernetic realm!

name: Blast 3D The Arrival: Chapter 0
description: Blast 3D The Arrival ~ Chapter 0 ~ Until one day...something of unknown origin came out of this world , a different kind of darkness one that this world has never experienced before... it all happened fast , at the edge of a small island ... where our unsuspecting hero.....

name: Black Screen
description: This game is nothing more than a dark image covering the entire screen area, without the presence of any additional extraneous stimuli. The freedom of own imagination and interpretation of the experience is under the complete control of the player.

name: Black Dungeon
description: Sin descripción

name: Bite Night
description: Bite Night is a comedic first-person horror game that explores the idea of what if the big bad monster was bad at their job of being scary.

name: Birds Adventure
description: Embark on an exciting journey with Flynn, a brave bird whose peaceful life is interrupted when his son is captured. Determined to retrieve him, Flynn plunges into a dangerous quest through stunning lands fraught with peril.

name: Birdfight
description: birdfight is a game about backyard birds in biplanes brawling in bold and bright battlegrounds to win worms!

name: Bio Prototype 2
description: There are many weirdos in the mysterious underground base, and a great evolution is being written. Activate 50 genetic potentials, transplant 60 mutated organs, and use 200 precise entry codes to create a life form that exceeds the limits of nature.

name: Binary Barrier
description: Defend your AI capital against endless alien invasions in this space shmup-inspired tower defense with roguelite randomness. Dissect bodies and ships to unlock weirdly powerful tech. Upgrade your base with turrets, turning your screen into a symphony of perfect destruction!

name: Bike Stunt 3D Freestyle
description: Carefully move 3d motorcycle stunt games for offroad driving tracks in this motorcycle stunt game 2023 is completely different from other bike games 2022 so you can easily perform unlimited 3d offroad stunts.

name: Big Pig
description: Collect all the food and don't get killed by the pigs that are chasing you !

name: Brinkmanship
description: Brinkmanship is a first person sci-fi mystery about greed, manipulation, and trust. As a spaceborne colonist 20 years into your voyage you've just discovered that your ship has secretly altered its heading. Your parents give you a gun. The ship goes into lockdown. What do you do? Who will you trust?

name: Bridges of Patience
description: A single-player Third Person Parkour game where you, as a pirate, try to pass levels by overcoming challenges such as moving bridges (you'll see others in the game).

name: Brick Storm
description: Enter the world of Brickorium, an exhilarating rogue-lite brick-breaker game! Take on increasingly challenging waves of bricks, earn gold, and unlock a variety of bonuses to enhance your abilities. Test your reflexes in this thrilling arcade challenge where every playthrough is unique.

name: Bricking Bots
description: Play as a brave little robot in a Retro 3D Collectathon! Solve room-sized physics puzzles, blast villains with your laser, and help your fellow workers rise against your tyrannical BOSS. The more bots you break, the easier each puzzle gets!

name: Brutal Bible Bloodbaths
description: Based on a shocking Bible passage, use your magic laser sword to chop up everything that breathes causing blood to spray and splatter everywhere.

name: Bug Ball 3D
description: BUG BALL 3D is a top down precision platformer where you take the role of a rollie pollie. Complete courses as fast as you can, or take it chill and complete them at your leisure.

name: Burn With Me
description: Devil deckbuilder where you burn your cards to succeed.

name: Burgguist
description: With the walking fortress Burggeist at your command, fight back the enemies and build "the Tower."

name: Bunny Shadow
description: Every step you take influences bunny journey and the outcome of her cursed existence. Will you unravel the mysteries of the past, confronting darkness with courage, or succumb to fear and desperation, sealing her fate in eternal torment?

name: Bungo's Bungite Collector
description: Collect all of the rarest Bungites and level them up so you can show them off to your friends! Gather Bungcoin to get rarer Bungites, debate them, and watch their stats grow to infinity!

name: Bullet: Surge
description: Bullet is an electrifying mix of Puzzle and Action! Assume the role of charismatic heroines, each bringing their own flair and unique gameplay to the game. Defeat all Bosses solo or bring the fight online!

name: Bullet Buddies
description: Escape the grasps of death in this top down co-op shooter where two ghost fight to return to their lives!

name: BuildWorld
description: Build Your Dream City

name: Candy Puzzle
description: FPS puzzle game where player need solve puzzles and collect cakes

name: Candy Roller
description: Control ball in this 3d ball game. Try to collect all keys to unlock finish before time ends and also collect cakes in every level. Be a master ball controller

name: Captain Carnage
description: Play as Captain Carnage - a chaotic superhero - and save the world from various supervillains in this exciting genre-mix of Hack and Slash and Third Person Shooter!

name: Captive: You Are My Idol
description: A young adult, Aylen, is an online personality who loves horror games. As she was shooting the intro for her next Let's Play, her biggest fan kidnaps her. There are only two means for escape: examine the area and begin plotting, or try your charisma and get an edge over him.

name: Car Car Up!
description: Does Size Matter? Find Out in Car Car Up!

name: Cardverse
description: Cardverse is a fun card game that will challenge your imagination. Dive into a world filled with unique works of art. Explore with your friends. Simple rules, endless fun, and encouraging creative thinking.

name: Care Bears: To The Rescue
description: Care Bears: To The Rescue is a platformer game set in the Care Bears universe featuring 30 levels across five unique worlds! Experience the game in singleplayer mode or up to 4 players in local co-op mode!

name: CarGo!
description: CarGo! is a chaotic couch co-op for up to four players. Working as a team of couriers try to collect and deliver as many goods as possible while keeping an eye out for time, traffic and roadworks!

name: Cars Spin
description: Cars Spin is an adrenaline-pumping, fast-paced game that will test your driving skills and reaction time.

name: Catwink
description: Catwink is a 3-6 player fast-paced card game that mixes Crazy Eights with Hot Potato. Sabotage your opponents and deflect incoming attacks as you race to get rid of all your cards. Every card triggers an effect that can flip the game on its head!

name: Cave In
description: stuck in a cave, survive and escape.

name: Cede
description: A Strategic Action RPG where players transform wastelands into beautiful utopias through combat farming, burst monsters into seeds becoming vegetation.

name: The Censor
description: Computer genius Yuto Fujimoto finds himself unemployed after graduating college. Wanting an easy life, he gets a job at Facibook as a censor. Editing online content may be boring, but Yuto FLIPS THE WORLD AROUND!

name: Celestial Rescuers 2: Zero Mission
description: Provide intergalactic humanitarian aid across universes! Fight against space pirates and race against the clock to preserve peace!

name: Celestial Contact
description: Experience Celestial Contact, a captivating fusion of shooter and rogue-lite genres set in a mysterious arena adorned with beautiful 2D pixel art. Battle through waves of enemies, gather gear, conquer bosses, and enhance your character to strive for the highest score and lasting survival!

name: CEO Tycoon: My Game Studio
description: Every swipe is a decision, every decision a potential path to glory or downfall. How will you lead?

name: Chaos Express
description: Run, Deliver and do it with care. Become an owner of Delivery point in near-future city and make all the parcels reach their destination. Do it yourself or with friends.

name: Chaos Magus
description: Dive into Chaos Magus, where you blend spellcasting with sword fighting.Craft 200 spells with a intuitive and deeply satisfying magic system.Tackle over 100 unique enemies with strategic combat where every choice matters. Experience an immersive VR adventure like no other!

name: Chaos Pieces
description: Chaotic board card game with too much freedom

name: Chaser of Light
description: It is a pixelated agile game presented in fresh light tones.

name: Check In
description: "Check in" is a pure collection-based game where there are no complex operations; completing all challenges simply requires checking in on different dates.

name: Checkout: Cashier Simulator
description: Checkout is a cute point-and-click pixel art cashier simulation game. Work shifts throughout the year and seasons, earn as many points as you can within each shift's time limit, and get to know your coworkers.

name: Cheese Party
description: Cheese Party is a casual match 3 game where you match charcuterie board delights to complete party orders with cute artwork. Create cheese knife specials and rainbow cheese if you match more. High point scores are rewarded with power ups to cheese the levels.

name: Chemia
description: Chemia is an adventurous survival crafting game played in a post natural disaster scene. This is a project in development state.

name: Clony
description: This is a 2D puzzle game with gravity. You can create a clone above your own head, and if you can press all the yellow buttons at the same time, you will clear the puzzle. Test your own puzzle skills while relaxing.

name: Clockwork Dawn
description: A new dawn approaches with the advent of intricate mechanical designs that will transform the world into an era of steam and steel. Take control of a country in this alternate history steampunk timeline and either survive and prosper or be forgotten in the dust of ages past.

name: Click On Spanners Together
description: Can you and your friends find all 100+ spanners in this panoramic level? Difficulty: Medium

name: Click On Bells Together
description: Can you and your friends find all 100+ spanners in this panoramic level? Difficulty: Hard

name: Climb Up To The Sky
description: Climb Up to the Sky is an adrenaline-fueled game that will put your reflexes and precision to the test.

name: Click Click Dig: Idle Mine
description: Click Click Dig is a free to play idle mining game that lets you dig deep into the core of several planets. Complete quests, unlock unique character skins, compete in challenges, upgrade planets - the choice is yours!

name: Coal Road
description: This is a horizontal shooter game. The story takes place in a city infected by "coal", where most people have become coal zombies. When the government learned of the great changes in the city, it sent two elite soldiers to investigate the situation.

name: Clutch-Master
description: This is a 2D top-down shooter with a flair of parody. You need to clutch 16 rounds in a row to win the map. There are 10 different maps in the base game.

name: Cloud Crashers
description: Fight for victory across airborne stages in Cloud Crashers, an arena platformer fighting game in the skies. Choose from a diverse roster of characters with unique weapons and abilities, and brawl it out against other Challengers in intense PvP action!

name: Closed Galaxy: Wata Tsumi yori Ai wo Komete
description: "There's Something on This Spaceship" An SF horror mystery adventure game depicting a life-or-death struggle against an alien that imitates your crewmates.

name: "Comrades, We Have a Mole Problem."
description: "Hear me comrade, lives are at stake here. You are to take matters into your own hands, saving yourself and your comrades from spies from the West. The party appreciates your work, but don't forget, the party will not forgive incompetence."

name: Construction Helper
description: Welcome to the dynamic realm of wealth and opportunity within the real estate domain!

name: Contingency Plan
description: "Contingency Plan" is an action-packed resource management game. Fight, repair, eat, sleep. Race against time to rid your home of the spreading corruption. Each new room presents unique challenges and vital survival tools. Beware, your body isn't what it used to be!

name: Contract Cafe
description: As Riko Feen, you manage a quaint café teetering on the edge of closure. But when a surprising letter arrives, everything shifts—now you must adopt Niya, a girl with a mysterious past. Amidst your efforts to rescue the café and navigate peculiar customers, secrets about the shop begin to surface...

name: Cookthulhu
description: A multi-ending cooking+adventure game.Heed the Oracles,explore the wilderness,gather ingredients, cook and feed, nurture a "monster" exclusive for you. What future will she and the world embrace? All depends on your choices. To eat, or to be eaten, this is a question.

name: Core Awaken Rurumu's will
description: To execute her command “Bring Mankind happiness,” Robot Rurumu hopes she can understand the "Happiness of Mankind" by becoming more human-like.

name: Corpo Connections
description: Match anomalies and descriptions to make connections that unravel the mysterious workings of your new employer in this stylistic horror adventure game.

name: Corporate Beatdown
description: You are the newest intern at SmashFest, a combat sports company with a violent corporate culture. Any office item can be a weapon. There is no HR department. The title of CEO awaits.

name: Corrupted Hottie
description: An adult visual novel where you seduce and corrupt your new roommate. Slowly influencing her into becoming more rebellious and sexual.

name: Corrupt Eldritch Order
description: Play as an assassin hired to complete a job in a dark city filled with corrupted beasts. A 2D Action-platformer where each level will test your will, ingenuity, and resourcefulness as you wade through beasts on your journey to complete your job.

name: Corti Co.
description: Corti Co is a Science Fiction, Visual novel sandbox. Follow several people involved in a conspiracy surrounding Corti Co, an AI development and research firm.

name: Cosmic Cowboy
description: Cosmic Cowboy is a tactic turn-based RPG inspired by the original Fallout, Borderlands and XCOM, where the player must navigate the distant planet of Armstrong and its dangerous inhabitants in this character-driven Space Western narrative.

name: CrossCraze
description: A fun, modern twist on the classic word game, designed for players who prefer the challenge of a computer opponent (you can also pass-and-play offline with a friend). Place your letters on the board to build crosswords. Use bonus squares to boost your score and take your word play to another level.

name: Crop Crusade
description: Explore and fight together with your fruit troops in this RTS meets 3D platformer adventure. The game features multiple ways to beat every level while guaranteeing a short but focused experience.

name: Cucumber
description: Cucumber is a clicker Game, in which you click a Cucumber! In Cucumber you click the Cucumber to gain even more Cucumber!

name: Cuca: Sharp Bite
description: Cuca has bewitched the Guardians of the forest, turning the animals aggressive. Guide Gracinda, a fearless dog, through a rescue adventure. Explore, avoid the enchanted animals, overcome obstacles, recover lost objects, and free the Guardians to restore balance in the enchanted Paradise.

name: Cube Hero Odyssey
description: Embark on a monster-slaying adventure as a caped hero wielding his anti-fragile blade! A hack-and-slash, isometric roguelite with beautiful procedurally generated worlds, challenging bosses, creative build choices and endless gameplay!

name: Crown's Labyrinth
description: Travel through different low poly labyrinths using real time tactics to track down the stolen crown before the monarchy crumbles. Stay one step ahead of the culprit using unique abilities to stun, bait and trap.

name: Crunky's Fun Rager
description: Hop your way through an endless arcade running experience where you complete challenges, collect letters, and defeat the Crunko Pops and anything they may be hiding. The game features tons of Achievements to collect, Stats to track, and Daily Leaderboards to compete against!

name: Crusader's Legacy
description: Bullet Hell, Fantasy, Action-RPG

name: Crying Crystal
description: 1: A 3-d character game. 2: Experience the passionate fun of killing monsters. 3: Getting a large number of crystals can improve your ability. 4: Role level up obtainning the corresponding skills.

name: Cryptic Route
description: "Cryptic Route" begins with the protagonist driving through a rainy night forest. Relying on navigation, each choice influences the outcome of the journey. The multiple ending system offers various results, immersing players into a tale of mystery and horror.

name: Crystal's Castle
description: 2-D Pixel art retro platformer

name: Curse of Yggdrasil
description: Curse of Yggdrasil is a challenging 3D action game where you must overcome formidable foes to escape the dimension that holds you captive. Defeating bosses allows you to absorb their souls, enabling you to incarnate them and head into battle utilizing their unique abilities.

name: Cursed Sword Edo
description: "HD-2D JRPG" Adam is a soldier who works for Edoward Kingdom. With his best friend Prince Edo, they travel the world to save their King.

name: Cursed Places: Hotel Floor 13
description: Cursed Places: Hotel Floor 13 is an observation game where you are trapped on the Cursed Floor 13. Reach the first floor to escape from this cursed endless loop

name: Daily Bread
description: It's a board game with sword fighting elements that you play with yourself and three other CPUs in a dark atmosphere.

name: Dark Destruction
description: This is an open world role-playing game with a medieval magical background, requiring players to explore. You can defeat invading enemies or lead followers to defeat evil leaders. Monster camps, wilderness bosses, dungeon dungeons are full of adventure and passion.

name: Dark Daemon
description: In the dark world where demons rule, a group of warriors who fight against the dark forces stand up, bring a ray of justice to mankind, and start an unprecedented adventure.

name: Dangerous Connections
description: As a crisis brews in the Soviet Union, all of your skills as special agent Dan Morris are in demand. Explore the dark machinations of your opponents in a gripping story with exciting and unforgettable characters and use weapons and vehicles typical of the time, as well as a series of spy gadgets.

name: Cyclopean: The Great Abyss
description: Cyclopean: The Great Abyss is a small scale, monochromatic CRPG in the style of Ultima, that takes place in the underworld of H.P. Lovecraft's Dreamlands.

name: Dark Door
description: "Dark Door" is a reasoning game developed by the Mallet Games, a studio composed of students from Bilibili.

name: Darkfall
description: Darkfall is a Survival-RPG where you must overcome a death loop to escape a dangerous island before your body withers like the others. Be resourceful by using strategy and stealth to develop survival skills capable of overcoming various aggressive creatures and even other players!

name: Dark Era
description: "Dark Era" invites you to an alternate timeline of the universe's demise, where "humanity's" desperate survival hinges on controlling black holes. Guide a space colony, manage resources, and advance tech. Explore space's mysteries while uncovering its secrets in an educational journal.

name: Dark & Quispy
description: A Fantasy Rouge-Like game with Paper thin graphics. Cut through waves of enemies and collect their souls to increase your power! Encounter a variety of enemies and events as you make your way through the DARK.

name: Darknesssssssssssssssss
description: This game is a medieval survival game. Defeat the enemies hiding in the castle. Actively use your shield and roll to avoid the enemy's attacks and exploit the opponent's loopholes to defeat the enemy.

name: Dark Memories: Investigation
description: An immersive first-person psychological horror set in a desolate, oppressive, and mysterious police building. Unravel cursed events while searching for your missing coworker.

name: Darkly Darkness
description: Darkly Darkness is a simple 2D action platformer where you jump and shoot, destroying carefully crafted enemies along the way using pistols, shotguns, and more. It is about a boy trying to discover what has happened to our planet recently. Is it aliens? Something else? He needs to find out.

name: Dead On Arrival
description: Dead On Arrival is a horror game set on trains. In the heart of an eternal night, a seemingly endless train barrels through a desolate, otherworldly landscape. Each carriage unfolds as a unique nightmare.

name: Death Protocol
description: The voices in your head keep repeating numbers. You know only one way to make them stop...

name: Deathland Drifters
description: Pilot a hovership across a doomed alien planet in this co-op roguelike FPS for 1-6 players. Master each hovership's unique playstyles, scavenge loot to create different builds, and work together with your crew of Drifters to fight your way off world.

name: Death Finder
description: horror experience, with puzzles to be solved and collecting files to win avoiding monsters and big giant spiders. Walk slow, pay attention to details and read all papers when see. Stay away from monsters and Spiders or risk becoming another victim of the abandon hospital

name: Deals With Witch
description: A crisis has descended upon the village where you live. Following an ancient legend, you embarked on the journey to find the witch. In order to save the village, you had to strike deals with the witch repeatedly. A huge conspiracy buried in history was also uncovered.

name: Dead Scrap
description: Stranded in the decaying space colony of the Reach after a catastrophic event known as necroevolution wipes out most of the population, you must navigate a dystopian nightmare. Craft, build, and fight to survive in this ruthless survival horror simulator.

name: Deliver Us Home
description: Deliver Us Home is a solitary sci-fi experience where one astronaut works to secure a new home and future for humanity.

name: Delivery Express
description: "Delivery Simulator": Drive and upgrade your delivery vehicle to handle more packages and improve energy efficiency. Tackle increasing daily challenges to become the ultimate delivery master.

name: Demon Crush
description: Demon Crush is a fast-paced 2D side-scrolling combat-platformer that blends expressive, combo-based fighting mechanics with the charming visuals and intuitive controls of a bygone era. Play as multiple characters, master different weapons and combat styles, and plunge into adrenaline-soaked action in a fantasy Japanese setting. Wall jumps, air combos, grappling hook traversal, super moves, chaotic battles, death-defying leaps, and razor-sharp duels to the death against inhuman, villainous bosses all await you!

name: Demon Kingdom
description: Demon Kingdom is a strategy card game with elements of a interactive novel. Rule the kingdom, solve mysteries, build relationships, and defeat your enemies.

name: Den of the Defiant
description: Den of the Defiant is a story-rich adult Visual Novel about a demon who is accidentally summoned by a coven of adorable witches. Navigate the strange world of the humans, forge bonds with your witches, and together face the coming storm.

name: Desk Deck Heroes
description: Dip your pen in the company ink with this roguelite card-based adventure game! Find heroes, assemble a powerful party, and get ready to fill your weekdays with battles and quests!

name: Desert Kingdoms 2
description: Desert Kingdoms 2 is a minimal real-time strategy game. Manage resources, develop villages, protect your king and conquer the desert!

name: Descent the Abyss
description: Descent the Abyss - you take on the role of an experienced detective who goes in search of a lost traveler lost in a dangerous underground labyrinth. You must explore dark and twisted corridors, solve puzzles, fight monsters, and overcome traps to navigate through danger and find the missing person.

name: Derf Party
description: Players compete in a shooter, party game where the rules and goals of the game change for every minigame.

name: Dino Precision Platformer
description: Dino Precision Platformer is an intuitive platformer game in which you play as a cute little dinosaur. The main feature of the game is that the platforms on which the dinosaur must jump appear and disappear at certain points in time.

name: DinD
description: Will the Earth be better off when it loses humans？ 'DinD' is a 3rd person action-adventure,Walking in a world where mankind has disappeared, but not in peace。 Explore worlds that are no longer familiar, slay all sorts of monstrous creatures, and find out the answers to the world。

name: Shaolin Bao
description: Beat and batter your friends in this chaotic party arena game. Sauce up your attacks with spicy power ups as you team up or dish it out solo in fast-paced rounds across interactive Chinese-inspired arenas.

name: DJ Simulator
description: DJ SIMULATOR takes you from "Bedroom DJ" beginnings to festival headlining superstardom! Master REAL DJing techniques, upgrade and buy more gear, learn to read crowds and climb the ranks to fame and success!

name: Dj 8 Beats: Infinite
description: ... One Dj ... ... eight Levels ... ... some beats ...

name: Dirty Love
description: Dirty Love - is an erotic game in the genre of "Arkanoid", in which you will have to break the cubes and gradually discover really beautiful and hot images.

name: Domino Fit
description: Can you Domino Fit? The best parts of sudoku, mixed with those little tiling puzzles you'd play at the dentist, Domino Fit is a rewarding logic puzzle about getting all the dominos to fit! Supports 6x6, 7x7, and 8x8 boards.

name: Don't Drop Luggage!
description: Don't drop your cargo! Your job is a simple task to load the falling cargo well so that it does not fall off the back of the truck. Some of the packages may be a little unusual, such as bear figurines or lampposts, but don't worry about the details.

name: Do You Remember?
description: An exploration indie horror game with a deep story based on nostalgia and forgetting. you play as someone who cant remember anything, and finds themself in a strange, yet... familiar place. they're just trying to find out what's happening, who they are, and what this all has to do with them, but...

name: Downpour Dash!
description: Downpour Dash is a fast-paced 3D platformer where you take on challenging curated levels and user-generated levels. Are you up to challenge?

name: Doom Roller
description: Doom Roller is a fast paced physics arcade game. Guide the ball through the level avoiding obstacles and the dreaded Orbs of Doom! Collect all the gems within time to proceed to the next level. There's an evil twist though... every time you collect a gem your time decreases by five seconds!

name: Doodle Harmony Idle Merge
description: Doodle Harmony Idle Merge is a cozy and relaxing idle game. Generate doodles or purchase them in the store. Customize your experience with a dark mode and a music selector. As you progress, you unlock new doodles, merge them to complete the doodle collection.

name: Don't Find Me!!
description: Dive into horror with Don't Find Me!!, where your mission is to survive by collecting 6 books while avoiding the lurking monsters. Keep your cool and your flashlight on to hope for escape. Are you ready to face your fears in this terrifying nightmare?

name: Nibeos
description:
Have you ever entered the L o s t t i m e beyond midnight? Have you ever felt the wind on an empty dark street? Have you ever climbed dark branches between the buildings of humankind? If you have perhaps you already know Nibeos, now hear the story of that place.

Experience a visual novel created entirely in paint and shadow, touch the horror of the depths of the sable time, drink in the dark jazz of the empty streets, soak in the atmosphere of the city, in summer, at night.

name: DrainSim
description: Dive into DrainSim and seize control of the floods! Clear the city's submerged streets, with a huge range of different tools from rakes to submersible pumps. Embrace the satisfaction of restoring the water flow. Become the city's hero, one drain at a time.

name: Dream Addict
description: Dream Addict is an action RPG set in a dream world. Battle animals and monsters with swords and skills to earn "Battle Memories." Use these at your base to unlock new abilities. Strengthen yourself as you explore the dreams. What lies at the end of your dream addiction?

name: Dream Hotel Master
description: Manage and operate your dream hotels, expand your business, enhance hotel services, and attract more guests to create a unique five-star hotel!

name: Dummy Guyz
description: Dummy Guyz is a multiplayer physics sandbox with no predefined rules. Get creative by building or breaking things your way. Warning: the game is bare-bones with no theme and minimal graphics, focusing solely on physics interactions.

name: DummyDoodle
description: Developed, drawed and song created by one. Try to eliminate Final Bosses and complete levels.

name: Dull Acres
description: You strayed from the path. Now you are doomed to wander the woods.

name: Duelite
description: The Wild West dueling card roguelite. Duelite is an attractive card game where you must survive countless duels against all types of rivals in the Wild West. Will you be able to build a deck on par with the most wanted? Find out yourself!

name: Dunderbeck
description: Build a gourmet sausage brand as a young, hungry entrepreneur (with a side hustle exterminating goblins.)

name: Dunes of Valor
description: You will fight in an open field in the desert, switching to AI control depending on the situation.

name: Dungeon & Doggies
description: Your human's missing & you're unleashed into a wild world! Explore the wilds, fight with cunning cardplay, and build the purrfect deck to conquer foes in this heartwarming adventure. Find your way home & prove you're more than just a pampered pet - you're a hero!

name: Echo: Defy Death
description: A Roguelite RPG about betrayal, revenge, and how much you’re willing to pay to get it. Use echolocation to fight your enemies, make pacts with demons to grow stronger, gather weapons, find the one who stole your eyes and make them pay!

name: EatFish
description: Eat small fish to accumulate points and continue to grow, pay attention to avoid red things!

name: Easy RTS
description: a minimalist rts game where decision-making is at the heart of simple and intuitive gameplay. Compete or cooperate with your friends online to build the best base.

name: Echoes
description: Fall through a hidden hole and find yourself trapped somewhere, where your voice is your only lifeline. Shout to light the darkness, and listen carefully to unravel the secrets that lurk within. But beware: the further you delve, the more terrors will emerge from the shadows...

name: Echoes Ⅱ
description: Sin descripción

name: Eden Warrior
description: Embark on a journey to claim back what was yours. Battle legendary warriors of the past in simple but challenging setup. Free them from the entity that has corrupted them. Find out who you are!

name: E-commerce Simulator
description: Build your own digital retail empire and serve customers from around the globe! E-commerce Simulator offers you a comprehensive virtual trading experience where you can showcase and sell various products.

name: Echo of Prypiat
description: "Echo of Prypiat" is an exciting walking simulator that immerses the player in the atmosphere of the Chernobyl exclusion zone, conveying all the horrors and fears of people left in this forgotten land. The game is created to allow the player to feel the soul of this mysterious place.

name: Echo of Mobius
description: Echo of Mobius is an innovative AI-driven role-playing game that incorporates CRPG-style adventures, simulation, and character-training gameplay. Players can create unique characters and their growth paths, or write and share adventure stories.

name: Echo in Capistrano
description: Echo in Capistrano is an atmospheric horror game with a simple goal - rescue the survivors, escape, and most importantly survive. Use your unique echo ability to find a path through the dizzying cave system of Capistrano, but be careful, there are things that lie in wait and they are hungry...

name: Echo Flesh Metal
description: Echo Flesh Metal is a turn-based role-playing roguelike game in a military-fantastic world, where further events and the plot depend on your every decision. You need to help the recruit complete several objectives in the anomalous zone, but is everything that simple?

name: Echoes of the Woods
description: Echoes of the Woods sets you into a terifying scenario where two kidnaped children must join forces to escape. As a 7-year-old, there's no fighting back, you can only hide and run... from the bogeyman.

name: Echoes Afterfall
description: Team up in a chilling co-op experience, delving into mysterious realms to unearth relics amidst lurking horrors. Survive together or succumb to the abyss.

name: EndGame
description: The ultimate action sci-fi RPG adventure, travel across time and explore places humans cannot go. Powerful monsters blocking your path and dangerous dungeons await you.

name: EOEOnline
description: EOEOnline is a fantasy MMORPG in a vast world with quirky and humorous characters and a depth of unique lore and world building. The game takes place in a dynamic world we're in game events become canon and build onto the game's lore and world.

name: Enoah's Quest
description: Enoah's Quest is a top-down adventure RPG, featuring captivating narrative, stunning three-dimensional visuals, and electrifying gameplay, providing a memorable adventure and action experience.

name: Emitime
description: A Grid-based deck builder RPG where music and beat are your strategies. Expand your deck as you capture the enemies you encounter along the way, and solve puzzles by switching between the two protagonists from the past and future as you explore the world.

name: EOL: End Of Line
description: A sci-fi turn-based strategy game, no gimmicky mechanics just pure 4x glory.

name: Equire
description: Dive into this immersive equestrian simulation and experience realistic horseback riding. Build your dream ranch and establish deep bonds with your horses. You are the boss! Manage staff and guests, or focus on challenging competitions. Breed, trade and raise foals as you choose your own destiny.

name: Escape Peng
description: Can you reach the top of the crevasse?

name: Escape from Ever After: Onboarding
description: A genre-bending RPG inspired by the classic Paper Mario games! Embark on a quest to battle Ever After Inc, a greedy megacorp from the real world, as they seize control of fairytales for their cheap labor! Escape from Ever After: Onboarding is a prologue ver. of the game Escape from Ever After.

name: Escape And Build
description: Escape from the enemies and build a fortress to face them, you can play alone or in online games of up to 4 players.

name: Fighting Frontier
description: The three-day doujin convention has opened, but many troublemakers have shown up. Fighting Frontier is a small comedy 3D third-person action game with 3 levels. Knock those troublemakers down before they break the roadblocks or get into the hall.

name: Finder
description: Finder receives an invitation to the Cradle from the lords of that ancient city. Use the map and unravel all the secrets of the mysterious labyrinthine, haunted city to find the only true path to the Philosophers Tower!

name: Find the Orange Narwhal
description: Overcome your crippling hangover and work out how to get the Narwhal back! Point-and-click your way around town, run errands, and uncover the mystery. But choose who you help carefully - your decisions may come back to bite you! Think outside the box and brace yourself for a fever-dream adventure!

name: Chess Club Valley
description: Chess Club Valley is a 2D Open-World Chess RPG. Experience this epic chess adventure for the first time across a world filled with unique character’s, monsters, secrets and super bosses, while playing chess to level up your XP. A total of 20+ hours of gameplay!

name: Modern Modern Chef
description:
One of the five titles in Game & Watch Gallery 2 was Chef, a game about a chef flipping food in the air with their frying pan to keep them from touching the ground. Alongside a remake of that handheld was also Modern Chef, a mini-game featuring Peach doing the same: keeping food in the air by flipping it in her frying pan. Though added challenges included aspects of cooking the food, feeding Yoshi, keeping food from burning, etc!

Modern Modern Chef is a remake of that remake! Faithfully recreated with completely hand-drawn artwork, playable with both the original gameplay style and a challenging new reaction-based game mode! Also included are several control and accessibility options plus secrets and unlockable extras!

name: Fortnite: Crimson Warden Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Rocket Racing: Fuse Starter Quest Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Lady in Midnight
description:
“The moment I see you, I want to do this… slowly and deeply, feeling every embrace.”

After getting lost due to a carriage accident, I was led by a dangerous-looking man into a mansion…

“If you don’t want to be tormented every night, you’d better listen to me.”

name: Idle Champions: Plushie Nixie Skin & Feat Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Nixie (if you don't already own them) Plushie Nixie Skin An Epic Feat for Nixie 7 Gold Nixie Chests 1 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Card 6 Epic Blacksmithing Contracts 6 Epic Bounty Contracts

name: Idle Champions: Plushie Evandra Skin & Feat Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Evandra (if you don't already own them) Plushie Evandra Skin An Epic Feat for Evandra 7 Gold Evandra Chests 1 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Card 6 Epic Blacksmithing Contracts 6 Epic Bounty Contracts

name: Idle Champions: Painted Tortle Gromma Theme Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Gromma (if you don't already have them) Painted Tortle Gromma Skin An Exclusive Familiar An Epic Feat for Gromma 1 Epic Potion of the Gem Hunter 16 Gold Gromma Chests with 2 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Cards

name: Idle Champions: Mythic Diana Theme Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Diana (if you don't already have them) Mythic Diana Skin An Exclusive Familiar An Epic Feat for Diana 1 Epic Potion of the Gem Hunter 16 Gold Diana Chests with 2 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Cards

name: Idle Champions: Icewind Dale Artemis Skin & Feat Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Artemis (if you don't already own them) Icewind Dale Artemis Skin An Epic Feat for Artemis 7 Gold Artemis Chests 1 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Card 6 Epic Blacksmithing Contracts 6 Epic Bounty Contracts

name: Idle Champions: High Harper Jaheira Skin & Feat Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Jaheira (if you don't already own them) High Harper Jaheira Skin An Epic Feat for Jaheira 7 Gold Jaheira Chests 1 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Card 6 Epic Blacksmithing Contracts 6 Epic Bounty Contracts

name: Idle Champions: Classic Remorhaz Familiar Pack
description: In this pack: Classic Remorhaz Familiar Sketch Skin for Remorhaz Familiar 2 Epic Potions of Speed 2 Epic Potions of Giant's Strength 2 Epic Potions of Clairvoyance

name: Idle Champions: Jack the Pumpkin Sprout Familiar Pack
description: In this pack: Jack the Pumpkin Sprout Familiar Pack 4 Epic Potions of Speed 4 Epic Potions of Giant's Strength 4 Epic Potions of Clairvoyance 1 Potion of Polish

name: Idle Champions: Classic Demogorgon Familiar Pack
description: In this pack: Classic Demogorgon Familiar Sketch Skin for Demogorgon Familiar 6 Epic Potions of Speed 6 Epic Potions of Giant's Strength 6 Epic Potions of Clairvoyance 6 Epic Potions of Fire Breath 1 Epic Potion of the Gold Hunter 2000 Modron Component Pieces 1 Potion of Polish

name: Idle Champions: Classic Nordom Skin & Feat Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Nordom (if you don't already own them) Classic Nordom (Fourth Edition) Skin Classic Nordom (First Edition) Skin An Epic Feat for Nordom 7 Gold Nordom Chests 1 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Card 6 Epic Blacksmithing Contracts 6 Epic Bounty Contracts

name: Idle Champions: Casual Karlach Skin & Feat Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Karlach (if you don't already own them) Casual Karlach Skin An Epic Feat for Karlach 7 Gold Karlach Chests 1 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Card 6 Epic Blacksmithing Contracts 6 Epic Bounty Contracts

name: Idle Champions: Aarakocra Glitch Orkira Skin & Feat Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Orkira (if you don't already own them) Aarakocra Glitch Orkira Skin An Epic Feat for Orkira 7 Gold Orkira Chests 1 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Card 6 Epic Blacksmithing Contracts 6 Epic Bounty Contracts

name: Beyond The Clouds
description: Embark on an exhilarating journey in 'Beyond The Clouds,' where parkour skills are key to conquering towering heights. Master fluid movement to overcome obstacles and puzzles, pushing your limits physically and mentally. Will you rise to claim your place beyond the clouds?

name: Beyond The Walls
description: Immerse yourself in a 3D tower defense game set in a medieval realm. Build towers with unique effects and strategically manage your town to amass resources. Master the elements and devise cunning strategies to triumph in this captivating fusion of defense and city management.

name: I Am Part-time Worker!!
description: This is an action-comedy game where you work part-time at a convenience store register while taking down troublesome "nuisance customers."

name: Hypogea
description: Escape from a mysterious underground megastructure in this short atmospheric 3d-platformer.

name: Hyperspace
description: This is a hardcore 3D detective/puzzle game. You will play as SU, a person from the future, who travels through wormholes across multiple timelines to solve puzzles, gather clues, and use deductive reasoning with the collected clues to uncover the truth.

name: Hyper Skater
description: Hyper Skater is a 2d Skate Platformer in a retro asthethic world.

name: HyperFatal
description: AIR STRAFE, ROCKET JUMP, and SURF your way through dimensions in this HYPER-intensive skill-based movement shooter of old. The onslaught of foes in your way are invading worlds, and the only way to stop them is to show you will be FATAL.

name: Hyper Drive Runner
description: You are a Hyper Drive Runner. You will guide your ship as far as you can while avoiding the many obstacles in the cosmos. The further you go, the higher the score you will achieve and the higher on the leader board you will place.

name: Hush Hush High
description: SHHH! Hold onto those secrets! Step into the mind of a gossip monger as she navigates through the corridors of her high school and help her resist the urge to share every tantalizing piece of gossip with quick time events.

name: Hyperslice
description: Fast paced action arena roguelike where you defeat waves of enemies using your dash. Slice through enemies or push them to survive. Upgrade and buy abilities throughout your run to turn your ship into a killing machine.

name: Hybrid Miniature Golf Beta
description: Experience the ultimate fusion of classic miniature golf and adrenaline-pumping action in Hybrid Mini Golf! Master parkour challenges, race against time, and craft custom courses with the intuitive map maker. Get ready to swing into a world of competitive fun!

name: Hup Hup The Cupcake
description: High jump, long jump, and wall jump your way through an endless array of procedurally generated levels set above the clouds! Customize the length and difficulty of your journey to your liking in Hup Hup The Cupcake, the relaxing 3D precision platformer!

name: Hunt the Pale Gods
description: A cosmic horror grid based roguelike deck builder. Fight nightmarish creatures, add cards to your deck, discover powerful curios and combine all their unique effects in game breaking synergies. Awaken and Hunt the Pale Gods.

name: Hunter Chronicles: Tara and Vyn
description: A charming, action-packed RPG inspired by handheld gaming classics! Platform your way through many colorful locations, and beat up baddies in a challenging, familiar mix of turn-based combat and skill-based timed hits, with a rockin' soundtrack, crisp pixel graphics and an emotional story.

name: Humans vs. Monsters
description: The objective of the game is to destroy the opposing team by capture.

name: Humanolve: A Human Evolution Card Saga
description: Embark on a primal card-based survival odyssey in Humanolve. Lead your tribe through perilous hunts, weather the wrath of nature, and forge tools of triumph. Combine cards to craft tools and weapons, explore the wilderness, and conquer your nemesis. Your choices will shape human evolution itself.

name: Hunter's Requiem
description: Hunter’s Requiem is a rogue-lite horror game. Coming from a long lineage of monster hunters, you must protect your town from the creatures surrounding it. Through crafting and exploration, you will discover the town's history and find a way to solve its monster problem once and for all.

name: Honcho
description: Take on the Keiretsu and reclaim your grandfather's rightful spot amongst Japan's financial elite. Use your bespoke kei truck to deliver packages, purchase real estate and expand your company to show them you're more than just another Sukeban.

name: Honor Battle
description: **Honor Battle**: Dive into the heart of conflict in this thrilling action game, where you stand as the last line of defense against a brutal terrorist insurgency.

name: Horatio: Connector 13
description: Akio's accidental encounter with "Horatio’s Life" leads to a mysterious journey intertwining his past with a parallel world. Unravel secrets, confront otherworldly threats, and uncover the truth in this atmospheric adventure.

name: Horatio: Connector 13 (Chapters 1-12)
description: Akio's accidental encounter with "Horatio's Life" leads to a mysterious journey intertwining his past with a parallel world. Unravel secrets, confront otherworldly threats, and uncover the truth in this atmospheric adventure.

name: Hot & Lewd: Miami
description: Get ready for an exciting world of vibrant colors, high speeds in Hot & Lewd: Miami. In this dynamic visual novel, you will meet the main character, a young guy who just graduated from the police academy but chose a life of wild parties and extreme street races over serving as an officer.

name: Horse Runner DX
description: Horse Runner DX is a wholesome, fast-paced platformer with a twist: You play a whole herd of horses! Combine different horses and power-ups, complete increasingly difficult challenges, chase new highscores and enjoy the ride from cute to chaotic fun.

name: Horror In Hongdae
description: Solve the mystery of the disappearance of a real estate tycoon. This adventure/visual novel game will unveil the secrets hidden behind the facades of a neighborhood in Seoul, with some being frightening and others holding pleasant surprises.

name: Horror: Evil Residents
description: Horror: Evil Residents is a thrilling 4-player co-op horror adventure, where you step into the shoes of a brave exorcist, venturing into a mysterious mansion plagued paranormal forces. Armed with seven sacred artifacts, you'll delve deep into their powers to unveil the demons' true names.

name: Hornet the Vanguard
description: "Reveal all, deceive all." Hornet the Vanguard, a mystery-solving adventure game. Solve mysteries and gather information in the exploration part, and uncover the truth in the deduction part! …The key to the case is always with buddy.

name: House of Golf 2
description: House of Golf 2 delivers an engaging multiplayer golf experience with over 100 unique holes to conquer. Gather up to 4 players for lively couch play sessions, showcasing your skills with jaw-dropping shots. Compete in live tournaments for exciting rewards and leave your mark on the world of golf!

name: HSHS
description: HSHS! Turn me on is a virtual interactive romance game designed for women. You will take on the role of Pricilla Tang, a new entrant live streaming operations assistant, you will encounter him amidst the hustle and bustle of daily life, leading to a destiny that is uniquely yours!

name: Impawlse
description: Take care of your kittens, decorate their space, play with them.... It's all about kittens! The ultimate cat experience awaits you!

name: Impostor Online
description: Inspired by the party games Werewolf and Mafia, Impostor Online is 6-18 online game of murder, mystery and deception. Sit with friends, play a civilian, an impostor, a butcher, a zombie or another type of character and use strategy to win!

name: Industring
description: A minimalistic urban planning puzzle. Manage resources and building locations. Accumulate knowledge points and discover the secrets of the destroyed planet

name: Infantry Attack: Drone Squad
description: Equip yourself with new drones and show your opponents who's the real boss!

name: Infantry Attack: Strike from Above
description: Equip yourself with a new secondary weapon and show your opponents who's the real boss!

name: Infernal Hunt
description: Forge your path through the fiery realms of Infernal Hunt, a captivating roguelike action game. Prepare for an epic adventure where you'll confront hordes of otherworldly creatures and navigate treacherous landscapes. Are you ready to become a true hunter of the damned?

name: Infinite Coaster
description: What speed would make the roller coaster go off the track? Experience a realistic yet crazy riding of Roller Coaster now! Can you reach the end safely in limited time? Accelerate the roller coaster boldly but cautiously, feeling your heartbeat and excitement now! Try now!

name: Infinite Survivor
description: Fight your way to survival with tons of abilities and Survivors to choose from. Create the ultimate combination of Survivor and Abilities in this rogue lite, bullet hell action adventure. Unlock new Survivors and use unique abilities to achieve the ultimate goal of survival.

name: Inkression
description: Enter the world of Milly Sommerville, a troubled tattoo artist tasked with capturing the remnants of her nearly-demolished neighborhood through her art. Walk the streets of her dark world, reconcile with her own past, and redefine the meanings of impressions in this first person narrative game.

name: In Search of Heroes!
description: Calling all Heroes! The age of knights is in its twilight, but the people still require your aid! Venture through various randomly-generated locales, complete quests and take down fearsome bosses. Return to your home estate to construct new buildings, equip powerful weapons, and rally new heroes!

name: Insectum: Epic Battles of Bugs
description: Immerse yourself in the epic battles of "Insectum" and unleash the power of your monstrous insects. Face off against your rivals on the battlefield by strategically using cards.

name: In Memoriam
description: Put your detective skills to the test, walk freely around the scene like a ghost, listening to the conversations and audio clues, discover the truth in each case and solve the mystery, how did you die?

name: Instant Armory
description: Instant Armory is an application that allows you to design arms, armor, and equipment for fantasy tabletop roleplaying games.

name: In The Disorderly Courtyard
description: This is a platform puzzle game, The game mainly tells the story of playing the female lead and repairing the virtual world. The game takes 2-3 hours and features unique cartoon rendering technology, global dynamic lighting, and a blend of sunrise and sunset colors and light sources.

name: Java Journey
description: Embark on a caffeine-fueled escapade! Play as a brave coffee cup reclaiming stolen treasures from tea slimes. Navigate charming landscapes, overcome obstacles, and solve puzzles. Join the whimsical adventure and taste victory!

name: Jesus Christ Simulator
description: 'Jesus Christ Simulator' is a new take on the 'Superhero Simulator' game genre. You are tasked by God your Father with fixing the broken system that humans now live in. Armed with Unlimited Miracles, Flight & Superpowers, you will change the world and help its people. You are THE Ultimate Superhero!

name: Jianghu Chronicles
description: Jianghu Chronicles is a Wuxia-themed clan simulator, which focuses on simulating Jianghu clans and experiencing realistic battle. Set up a clan of your own, recruit disciples, complete missions... And eventually make your clan second to none by improving its power and reputation.

name: Jin Ping Mei
description: This game is adapted from the classic novel Jin Ping Mei. The protagonist was born in a merchant family. His parents died young and left him a pharmacy. On his 25th birthday, he made a vow: I will spend the rest of my life with wives and concubines, rich as hell...

name: Jordi & Oslo: The Lost Tail
description: Cute 2D Point-n-Click of the adorable comic book characters Jordi and Oslo the dragon.

name: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate Jigsaw: Mini Beasts
description: Pixel Puzzles, The Number #1 place for Jigsaws!

name: John Fox
description: John Fox is an elite warrior and super soldier who saved the leaders of various States. He was a professional mercenary who retired with honor. But now his beloved pet, Milo, has been killed. You have to avenge him!

name: Josh Powlison's Button: Mildly Remastered Edition
description: Press a button. Increment a number. Change reality. The instant classic returns for a mildly remastered electric boogaloo on modern computer systems. Once again experience the euphoria of button pressing with Josh Powlison's striking developer commentary to guide you.
